Name: Eurostars Universal Lisboa
Description:
Set in Lisbon, 600 metres from Lisbon Oceanarium, Eurostars Universal Lisboa offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a business centre and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. Every room includes a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Eurostars Universal Lisboa have a city view.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Gare do Oriente is 700 metres from Eurostars Universal Lisboa, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 7.9 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Locke de Santa Joana
Description:
Locke de Santa Joana features accommodation located 300 metres from the centre of Lisbon and offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The aparthotel provides rooms with air conditioning, available on site private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

At the aparthotel, units are equipped with a wardrobe. Every unit includes a kettle, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

The aparthotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast. The restaurant at Locke de Santa Joana serves Mediterranean cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Universo Romantico
Description:
Universo Romantico features accommodation situated 200 metres from the centre of Lisbon and offers a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

Some accommodation includes a terrace and a satellite flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and heating. At the guest house, some units are allergy-free and soundproof.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and cheese are available each morning. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. Dining options are available close to the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Universo Romantico include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Bica FLH Suites
Description:
Bica FLH Suites is located in the historical centre of Lisbon, within the famed Bica neighbourhood. The building which was an art gallery since the fifties, was refurbished in the beginning of 2017.

The comfortable rooms feature a rainfall shower, free toiletries, hair dryer, air conditioning, desk and a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is available and the cosy terrace outside is ideal for warm evenings. Some of the rooms offer a view overlooking the garden.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, also there is a wide range of restaurants and bars in the surroundings. This Bed and Breakfast is located halfway between Chiado and Bairro Alto.

The Baixa-Chiado metro station is within 300 metres. Cais do Sodré station is at a 10-minute walk and connects with Belém and Cascais. The Rossio train station is an 8-minute walk and connects with scenic Sintra. The nearest airport is Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Bica FLH Suites.

Name: Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE
Description:
Located 400 metres from Marques de Pombal Square and Metro Station, Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE has stylish, modern rooms.

Featuring free WiFi, the air-conditioned rooms are brightly decorated, with designer furniture. Each has a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and desk. With lots of natural light, the bathrooms provide free toiletries, large showers and a hairdryer.

The 24-hour reception staff can provide luggage storage and assist with car hire. Avenida da Liberdade, Lisbon’s trendy main street and home to many exclusive shops, is 400 m away.

Eduardo VII Park is 7 minutes’ walk away and Saldanha Metro Station, offering direct access to Lisbon International Airport is within a 15-minute walk. Underground parking is available on site.

Name: Lisbon 5 Hotel
Description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Lisbon, Lisbon 5 Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is around 1.4 km from St. George's Castle, 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium and 7.8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at Lisbon 5 Hotel also offer a city view.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Varandas de Lisboa - Tejo River Apartments & Rooms
Description:
Varandas de Lisboa - Tejo River Apartments & Rooms has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Lisbon, less than 1 km from St. George's Castle, a 12-minute walk from Rossio and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property features garden and city views, and is 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is 2 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Commerce Square.

At the apartment complex, units have a wardrobe. Units are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have river views. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Jeronimos Monastery is 7.3 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7.8 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra
Description:
WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra has a balcony and is set in Lisbon, within just 2 km of Commerce Square and 1.9 km of Rossio. The property is located 2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 6.3 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Gare do Oriente is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Apartment Yellow Bica
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Apartment Yellow Bica is an accommodation located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.2 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio. It is set 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and provides a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from St. George's Castle.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with river views. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.4 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Apartment Yellow Bica.

Name: Hotel Botanico
Description:
Hotel Botânico is situated in between Avenida da Liberdade and the university’s Botanical Gardens, just a 5-minute walk from the Avenida Metro Station.

Botânico‘s guest rooms have air conditioning, minibars and flat-screen TVs. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with bath or shower.

Guests can enjoy a wholesome breakfast in the breakfast room in the morning. It includes different types of bread, cereals, yoghurt and fruits.

After a busy day of sightseeing, guests can have some Portuguese wine in the lounge or read international newspapers to catch up on the news. It is also possible to make free use of Wi-Fi here.

Hotel Botânico is located just 8 km from Lisbon Airport.

Name: We Love F Tourists
Description:
We Love F Tourists features free WiFi. The hostel is located near central Lisbon, at just a 7-minute drive from Marquês de Pombal Square and a 3-minute walk from Rossio Metro Station.

All rooms at the hostel feature access to shared bathroom facilities. The unit’s accommodation is divided into private double rooms and dormitory rooms, all with scenic Lisbon views. Daily cleaning service is provided.

Guests can make full use of the shared kitchen in order to prepare their own meals. An on site snack-bar is also available for lighter meals and Portuguese snacks.

The communal living area features comfortable sofas in a tranquil ambiance and has a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player, as well as an iPad. There is also a bar, where refreshing cocktails and drinks are served.

The Rossio historical area is a 3-minute walk away, while the Chiado is a 9-minute walk away. It is a 7-minute walk from Coliseu dos Recreios. Bairro Alto, Lisbon’s main bar area, is a 20-minute walk. Airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge. We Love F Tourists is a 12-minute drive from the Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Madalena Hermitage
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, Madalena Hermitage is an 18th-century building offering modern, design apartments. It is only a 2-minute walk to Praça do Comercio and has views of Lisbon Cathedral.

The apartments are decorated in pastel colours and have modern kitchens with a dining area. Each apartment has one private bathrooms which is stocked with free toiletries. Each is air conditioned and has a satellite TV and free WiFi.

Guests can buy groceries for self-catering at the supermarket 150 metres away. Local restaurants and bars are available within a 2-minute walk.

The ferry across the River Tagus leaves from Terreiro do Paço Square, 300-metres away, which also has a metro station. The Cais do Sodré‎ Train Station offers connections with Sintra and Cascais and is only 1 km away from the Madalena Hermitage.

Name: Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa
Description:
In a prime location in the centre of Lisbon, Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa provides continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 7.9 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Commerce Square.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all units at Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: GuestHouse Pena
Description:
Boasting a terrace, GuestHouse Pena is situated in Lisbon, 800 metres from Liberty Avenue. Popular points of interest around the property include Rossio and Chiado. The property is located in the Arroios district.

The units at the guest house come with access to either a communal bathroom or to a private bathroom. Rooms at GuestHouse Pena also have free WiFi, a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Bairro Alto is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Amoreiras is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from GuestHouse Pena.

Name: Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Marquês de Pombal
Description:
Located next to the Eduardo VII Park, ibis Styles Lisboa Marquês De Pombal offers comfortable rooms with a contemporary décor. Free WiFi and laundry facilities are available and the property was renovated in December 2018. There is a public parking in 50 meters from the hotel.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, minibar, safe and private bathrooms. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as accessibility for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is not included in rate and the modern restaurant, which opens for lunch and dinner, serves Portuguese and international cuisine as well as a children's menu. In addition guests can relax at the on-site bar.

ibis Styles Lisboa Marquês De Pombal is centrally located, a 2-minute walk from the metro and bus stop to the airport. The unit is a 5-minute walk to the shopping centre El Corte Ingles and a 5-minute walk to Avenida da Liberdade, one of Lisbon's most iconic streets.

Name: Hotel Do Chile
Description:
Hotel Do Chile is situated in Lisbon. It offers free WiFi and a living room for breakfast.

Guest rooms of the Hotel Do Chile include TVs with 50 channels, air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests can benefit from a bike rental service, a 24-hour reception and a hotel bar. There are also vending machines with drinks and snacks.

The Arroios Metro Station is situated 50 metres from Hotel Do Chile, and offers direct access to Lisbon’s city centre in 3 stops. Lisbon Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Name: Star inn Lisbon Airport
Description:
Located 100 meters from Lisbon Airport Humberto Delgado, Star inn Lisbon Airport features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Private indoor and outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy snacks during the day at the Stars Caffé from 11h00 until 02h00, as well as continental breakfast buffet from 02h00 until 05h00 and full breakfast buffett from 05h00 until 11h00.

Nations Park is 2.8 km from Star inn Lisbon Airport, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 2.9 km away.

Guests have easy access to all Lisbon through the Airport Metro Station, located a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, a few steps from Star inn Lisbon Airport.

Please note that the baby cot/crib can only be provided after a confirmation from the hotel. Any supplements such as extra beds are not included in the room rate automatically. Therefore, it will be paid directly to the property separately from the reservation price.

Please note that reservations of 9 rooms or more are subject to different policies and extra charges. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property.

For reservations made with a third party credit card, any previous charges will be reimbursed and the full payment will be requested upon check-in.

Please note that a maximum of 2 pets up to 20kg per accommodation are allowed, at a cost of 25€ per pet, per night. Pets are permitted at the restaurant and bar. When travelling with pets, please note that a refundable damage deposit of 100€ per stay, applies.

Name: Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites
Description:
Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites offers modern and elegant apartments and rooms in Lisbon’s Alfama district. Located less than 10 minutes walking distance from São Jorge Castle, some have Tagus River views.

All apartments and rooms at Lisbon Lounge are modern and spacious. The apartments include a fully equipped kitchen and a living room with sofa bed. Rooms and apartments include free WiFi and each has its own private bathroom.

Guests staying in the apartments can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants and bars, within 500 metres.

Guests can relax in the living area of the lobby, equipped with plush sofas, and there is luggage storage available for extra comfort.

The front desk can arrange a shuttle service to Lisbon Airport, located 7 km away. Traditional Lisbon trams run right in front of Lounge Suites and can take guests to Chiado district. Portas do Sol viewpoint is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Casa Belmonte
Description:
The recently-renovated Casa Belmonte has comfortable accommodation just a 3-minute walk from the Marquês de Pombal Metro Station. It is located in the Portuguese capital, just 300 metres from the central Marquês do Pombal Square.

All the soundproofed rooms at the Belmonte feature air conditioning, private bathroom, flat-screen cable TV, free WiFi and a mini-fridge. Some rooms also feature balconies and a view. Daily cleaning service is provided.

Guests can try the local cuisine in one of the many restaurants available within 300 metres of the property.

The El Corte Inglés shopping centre and the Amoreiras shopping centre are a 3-minute drive and have a number of shops, boutiques, supermarkets and food courts. The Bairro Alto is Lisbon’s foremost nighttime hotspot and is an 8-minute drive away. There, guests can find a wide variety of bars and cafés. The Chiado and the Rossio historical areas are an 8-minute and a 4-minute drive, respectively.

The Lisbon International Airport is a 15-minute drive from the guest house.

Name: Pensao Praca Da Figueira
Description:
Housed in a listed baroque building with Rossio Metro Station on its doorstep, this entirely non-smoking guesthouse offers great value-accommodation in Lisbon's historic Baixa Pombalina. It features free WiFi access.

Some rooms are air conditioned and provide en suite bathrooms with hairdryer; others offer views of Praça Da Figueira Square.

Pensão Praça Da Figueira also offers 24-hour reception services to its guests. There is a laundry and ironing service available, as well as bicycle rental and luggage storage.

Situated among traditional restaurants and Fado houses, Pensão Praça Da Figueira is 2 metro stops away from Cais Do Sodré Train Station, linking directly to the seaside resort town of Cascais.

Name: Férias no Bairro
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Férias no Bairro is situated in the Avenidas Novas district of Lisbon, 5 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 5.2 km from Rossio. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Luz Football Stadium is 3.5 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 5.3 km from the apartment, while Commerce Square is 5.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Hotel Gat Rossio
Description:
Providing ultra modern rooms with total-white designer furnishings, Gat Rossio is centrally located on a quiet street behind Restauradores Square and metro stop. It features an outdoor terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms are air conditioned and include flat-screen TV sets with cable channels. Some rooms open out onto balconies, while all come with a work desk and en suite bathroom facilities.

Guests at Hotel Gat Rossio can benefit from the location and discover many nearby eateries, serving traditional dishes from Lisbon’s rich gastronomy.

The iconic St George’s Castle is within a 10-minute walk, and Rossio Train Station is 50 meters from the Gat Rossio hotel. The Aerobus Shuttle from Portela Airport stops just a few metres from the property’s doorstep. It is only 4 minutes’ walk to the Av. da Liberdade.

Name: Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente
Description:
Set in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Lisbon Oceanarium, Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Gare do Oriente.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms feature a desk.

Guests at Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

With staff speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, around-the-clock information is available at the reception.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 7.7 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 8.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Travel Park Lisboa

This hotel in the East of Lisbon is just 100 metres from Anjos Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from the bustling Praça Dom Pedro IV. It has a bar with terrace.

Name: America Diamonds Hotel
Description:
Housed in a restored historical building, the America Diamonds Hotel is located in Lisbon, a 10-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square. Picoas Metro Station is located right opposite the hotel.

Renovated in 2020, the modernly designed guest rooms of the America Diamonds Hotel offer free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. They are decorated in deep blue and burgundy, and furniture with clean lines. Some rooms include a hydro-massage bathtub.

Name: Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel
Description:
Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 800 metres from Amoreiras Shopping and a 14-minute walk from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. The hotel is within a mere 170 metres from the Rato Metro Station.

Featuring double rooms, twin rooms and junior suites, the Sao Bento Hotel has accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi access. Every room or suite is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, with some featuring views of the river or city. Guests will find a private bathroom in their accommodation, which includes free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the comfortable breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast option is also available, upon previous request. Guests will be able to find a variety of restaurant and café options in the vicinity. Several restaurants are available within a 5-minute walk and Avenida da Liberdade has assorted eateries, where guests can discover the famed Portuguese cuisine.

Those wishing to stay in, or just relaxing after a day of getting to know the city, can enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail at the hotel's on site bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property, for guests' convenience.

At 1.8 km is the historic Rossio Square, reachable via metro ride and just a short walk away from the Tagus River. Bairro Alto is 1.4 km from Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel and is renowned for its lively atmosphere and multiple bars. Chiado is at 2 km from the property. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 8.1 km away and can also be reached via metro.

Name: Independente Príncipe Real
Description:
This Art Deco hostel is within a renovated palace and overlooks São Pedro de Alcântara and Tagus River. Set on the border of Lisbon's trendy Bairro Alto district, it provides free WiFi and a restaurant with a secluded beer garden.

The Independente provides modern dormitory rooms and private suites with classical Portuguese architecture and a distinct décor and feel. All rooms have seating areas and high ceilings. Some offer balconies with river views. Guests have access to communal kitchen facilities and to a shared lounge area.

Modern Portuguese cuisine can be enjoyed in the Art Deco setting of the Decadente Restaurante & Bar. All meals and cocktails are prepared with locally sourced produce.

Elevador da Gloria Tram Stop is situated right opposite Independente Príncipe Real. Pink Street, a renowned nightlife hotspot near Cais do Sodré, is 900 metres away. The Portela Airport is 8 km away, while the Caparica beaches can be found 20 km from the hostel. Lisbon International Airport is at a 25-minute drive from the property.

Name: Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto
Description:
Located 100 metres from Lisbon International Airport, the new Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel offers a lounge bar and a restaurant on site

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a sober décor with bold accents. All rooms come with a mini-bar, a cable flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Guests can wake up to a wholesome breakfast buffet each morning. At Restaurante Colinas de Lisboa , lunch and dinner are served à la carte and include regional and international cuisine. For a pre-dinner drink head to the lounge bar located on the reception floor.

At the hotel guests will find the El Spa, a space where guests can break from routine and recharge their batteries in the swimming pools, the hot tub, hydromassage facilities, waterfalls, sauna and Turkish bath. At the gym guests have a full specialist support. The hotel features indoor and outdoor parking, with paid electrical vehicle charging stations.

Parque das Nações business district is down the avenue, less than 3 km away from Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel. The Aeroporto Metro Station is within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Hotel Mundial
Description:
Set in Lisbon’s historic Baixa Pombalina district, this 4-star hotel features a terrace with stunning panoramic city and São Jorge Castle views. Private parking at the hotel is possible on site (reservation is not possible) and has a daily cost. The property is a 2-minute walk from Rossio Square.

Renovated in March 2016, rooms at the Hotel Mundial have air conditioning and traditional-style furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a bathrobe and hairdryer.

The bright Varanda de Lisboa Restaurant offers local cuisine in an à la carte style. Both the restaurant and the rooftop bar offer sweeping views over Lisbon. The newly-opened Adega Premium Winehouse Bar & Shop has an extensive wine list, as well as a décor inspired by traditional wine cellars. the Adega is ideal for lovers of tasty cheeses, local chorizos and Portuguese snacks.

Bairro Alto, the city's famed bar area, is a 10-minute walk, as are the shops and cafés of Chiado. There is a stop of the famous Tram 28 and City Tours Hop on Hop off in front of the property. Hotel Mundial is a 5-minute drive from the iconic St. George's Castle, and is a 10-minute walk from various shops and restaurants. It offers 24-hour front desk service, and can assist in car hire. The Mundial is 6.5 km from Lisbon International Airport.

Located only 200 metres from Campo Pequeno Metro Station in central Lisbon, Hotel Alif Campo Pequeno offers modern rooms, some with a private balcony. Facilities include a 24-hour reception.

The air-conditioned rooms of Hotel Alif are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have cable TV, a work desk, and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers laundry services, fax and photocopying services, and car rental.

The Calouste Gulbenkian Museum is a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Alif Campo Pequeno is a 10-minute drive from Lisbon’s Portela Airport and the Rossio Train Station.

Name: Novotel Lisboa
Description:
Offering an extensive breakfast buffet and free Wi-Fi, Novotel Lisboa is situated 500 metres from Lisbon Zoo and a 5-minute walk from the Praça de Espanha Metro Station and Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation.

The spacious rooms of Novotel Lisboa feature modern design and include flat-screen TVs and coffee&tea facilities. Up to 2 children (under 16 years) stay free when sharing with parents.

Guests can enjoy international and Portuguese cuisine at the Bicicleta Restaurant until 23:00 which serves snacks as well.

After training in the fitness centre, guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor seasonal swimming pool. Free WiFi access is available.

The El Corte Inglés Mall is situated a 12 minutes away from Novotel Lisboa. Lisbon International Airport is easily accessible through the Aerobus.

Set in Lisbon, room00 Lisboa Hostel is 200 metres from Liberty Avenue and offers facilities like terrace. The property is located 900 metres from Rossio. Situated in the Santo Antonio district, the hostel is within 900 metres of Dona Maria II National Theatre.

Name: Loving Chiado
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Loving Chiado is located in the heart of Lisbon, in the Chiado area. Rossio and Baixa/chiado metro stations are a 5-minute walk.

The 6 air-conditioned apartments are all modernly decorated and include a dining and seating area with a flat-screen TV. In the private bathrooms guests will find free toiletries.

In each unit, there is also a kitchen where guests can prepare their own meals. It is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, a microwave and a coffee machine. All apartments feature a washing machine and some include dishwasher.

Rossio is 300 meters from the property and Carmo Square is 180 meters away. Lively Bairro Alto is a 7-minute walk from the Loving Chiado, while Liberty Avenue and its high-end shops is a 10-minute walk. Lisbon International Aiport is 8 km from Loving Chiado and is easily accessed by metro.

Name: Hotel 3K Madrid
Description:
Hotel 3K Madrid is located 500 metres from Marquês de Pombal Square and the Avenida da Liberdade in Lisbon. The nearest Metro Station is Picoas, at 400 metres, while Marquês de Pombal Metro Station is 500 metres away.

The Hotel 3K Madrid offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and minibar. The air-conditioned accommodations are decorated with warm colours, wooden furniture and parquet floors. All rooms have a hairdryer and a private bathroom, in addition to a laptop-size safe.

Every morning guests can enjoy a local and international breakfast buffet, prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients. The 24-hour Honesty Bar is located at the lobby and  bar serves a variety of drinks and refreshments. A safety deposit box is available with the front desk.

The 24-hour front desk staff can advise guests on the best spots in Lisbon, arrange a restaurant, car rental and currency exchange as well as flight details. The property features a small rooftop pool with sun loungers.

Lisbon’s historical city centre is a 20-minute walk away. Due to its location, the 3K Hotel Madrid offers multiple choice of restaurants, brand stores and museums, along Avenida da Liberdade Avenue.

Name: MIDIS - Local Accommodation
Description:
MIDIS - Local Accommodation is set in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, and is 700 metres from Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is also 1.8 km away from Chiado and 2.1 km from Liberty Avenue.

The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. MIDIS - Local Accommodation offers some units with city views, and the rooms include a shared bathroom. Guest rooms feature a desk.

Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Commerce Square is 2.8 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from MIDIS - Local Accommodation.

Name: HF Fenix Music
Description:
Located at the centre of Lisbon, HF Fenix Music is a charming themed hotel, with a rooftop swimming pool and far-reaching city views from its terrace. The brand-new hotel is a 4-minute walk from posh Avenida da Liberdade.

All the elegant rooms at the HF Fenix feature a musical theme, visible in its furnishings, colour patterns, decorated walls and even in its architecture. Each air-conditioned room is soundproofed and comes equipped with a Bluetooth sound system, multicoloured dynamic lightning, a wall-mounted flat-screen cable TV, safe and a desk. Also included are a private bathroom with free toiletries, as well as free WiFi access.

The lobby bar and the rooftop lounge bar have a variety of refreshments and snacks on offer. Some of Lisbon’s restaurants are within easy reach, at a 5-minute walk.

Marquês de Pombal Metro Station is just 110 metres away and provides connections with most of the city. Eduardo VII Park is 400 metres away. Nearby Avenida da Liberdade is filled with high-end shops and boutiques. Chiado and Rossio are historical areas which guests may reach through a 15-minute Metro ride. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 7.7 km away from the HF Fenix Music.

Name: Exe Saldanha
Description:
Attractively set in the centre of Lisbon, Exe Saldanha is within 2.6 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.1 km of Rossio. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Exe Saldanha rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 3.2 km from Exe Saldanha, while Commerce Square is 3.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Hotel ibis Lisboa Saldanha
Description:
The Hotel ibis Lisboa Saldanha welcomes you to the heart of Lisbon. Enjoy maximum comfort thanks to our modern and completely renovated rooms, ideal for your tourist or professional stays. Accessible via a lift, all renovated rooms are air-conditioned and include a TV with cable/satellite channels. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A hearty all-you-can-eat breakfast is available as well as a bar open 24 hours a day with a snack offer. For ease of travel, Saldanha Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the property. The 24-hour reception is also at your disposal.

The spacious breakfast room adjoins Ibis Lisboa Saldanha’s bar, where a variety of international drinks are served. Portuguese eateries and intercontinental restaurants are situated within a 5-minute walk.

Guests can make use of the free Wi-Fi connection in public areas. With private covered parking, guests also have easy access to the A1 highway, 4 km away, and to the nearest beaches, 20 km away.

The hotel is situated a 15-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square and Avenida da Liberdade. Lisbon Airport can be reached in a 15-minute drive.

Name: Avenue Hostel & Suites
Description:
Avenue Hostel & Suites offers comfortable accommodation in Lisbon’s centre, 100 metres from Liberty Avenue. The property is a 5-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square and from the nearest Metro Station.

This unit features dormitories, rooms, suites and studios. The rooms all have access to shared bathroom facilities, while the suites and studio each have their own private bathroom. The studio also has a small kitchenette. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

Breakfast is not included. Guests are welcome to visit the surroundings and discover many Portuguese-style and international restaurants. Many establishments are reachable within a 5-minute walk.

Historic Rossio is a 6-minute Metro ride away, as is the equally renowned Chiado. Bairro Alto is a popular nightlife area and is 1.5 km from the B&B. Portela International Airport is 6.6 km away from the Avenue Hostel & Suites. The airport is reachable via metro and a shuttle service is alos available, upon request and at an extra fee.

Name: Charming Apartment in Alfama
Description:
Set in Lisbon, near St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Charming Apartment in Alfama features free WiFi. The property is situated 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7.1 km from Lisbon Oceanarium and 7.9 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1 km from Commerce Square, and within 2 km of the city centre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher and an oven. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Gare do Oriente is 8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Charming Apartment in Alfama.

Name: The 8 - Downtown Suites
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon city centre, The 8 - Downtown Suites is set in a refurbished 18th-century building in the Pombaline quarter. Sao Jorge Castle is within a 10-minute walk.

The elegant rooms at the 8 are modern and include unique design pieces, such as paintings, Portuguese pottery, vintage furniture and design chairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have a private bathroom, equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, safe and a minibar.

Each floor has a Nespresso coffee machine, and there is also a bar, where light meals are served. Guests are 700 metres from Bairro Alto, featuring a wide selection of restaurants and a vibrant nightlife.

Staff at The 8 - Downtown Suites can organise tours, and car and bike rentals. Rossio is within a 5-minute walk, while the famed São Jorge Castle is at 400 metres. Popular Chiado is a 5-minute walk, while the nightlife of lively Bairro Alto is within an 8-minute walk. Guests arriving at Rossio Train Station are 8 minutes’ walking from The 8 Downtown Suites. Lisbon International Airport is around 7 km away.

Name: Internacional Design Hotel
Description:
Occupying a fantastic position on the south side of Rossio Square in Lisbon city centre, the Internacional Design Hotel is a modern and trendy hotel, which offers a welcome drink to all its guests. The property houses the famed Bastardo Restaurant and has views over the historic city centre.

The rooms at this design hotel are spread over 4 floors, with each floor having its own theme and character. With a very unique flavor, all of the accommodation is arty or contemporary in style and offers en suite facilities. Corridors have unique colours, scents and have hanging pictures and paintings depicting famous personalities. Free WiFi is provided and room service is available, upon request.

Breakfast is served each morning, with a view to Rossio Square. The Bastardo Restaurant specializes in refined interpretations of classic Portuguese dishes and delicacies, while also featuring some Asian influences. Internacional Design Hotel has a comfortable and modern bar, which specializes in signature cocktails and beverages. Chiado and Bairro Alto are both within a 5-minute walk, featuring various options in restaurants, cafés and assorted eateries.

The Internacional Design Hotel overlooks Rossio Square, a lively piazza with many restaurants, bars and shopping opportunities. Just across from the hotel is a stop for the famed Lisbon Trams. From here, guests can catch a tram to explore the city's historic areas, going as far as Belém, home of the delicious Pastéis de Belém. The hotel is also right by Rua Augusta, Lisbon’s main pedestrian street.

Name: Lisbon Cheese & Wine Suites
Description:
Located in the trendy Santos district in Lisbon, Lisbon Cheese & Wine Suites offers a unique experience in elegant and carefully decorated accommodation. Free WiFi is available at this guest house.

Each of the guest house's rooms includes an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and high quality amenities.

A delicious breakfast is included in some rates and is served every morning. In the vicinity guests will find a variety of traditional Portuguese restaurants. There is also plenty of bars where guests can relax and enjoy a beverage in the evening.

Major city attractions like Chiado, Bairro Alto, Principe Real and Cais do Sodré are within 1.5 km. Private sightseeing tours are available with special conditions.

Lisbon International Airport is 12 km away and a shuttle may be arranged upon request.

Name: Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.1 km from Commerce Square and 800 metres from St. George's Castle, Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Residencial Florescente
Description:
Located in the historic centre of Lisbon, Baixa Pombalina, this hotel is near the Restauradores and Rossio Squares. It has a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade, an IHG Hotel
Description:
The Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade is a comfortable accommodation choice set in Lisbon's centre. Liberdade Avenue is a 4-minute walk and is home to some of the trendiest shops and fashion houses in the city.

All air-conditioned rooms are non-smoking and include free WiFi access, flat-screen cable TV, private bathroom and an electric kettle. Complementary coffee and tea is provided.

A varied breakfast buffet is available each day at the Holiday Inn Express. For more meal options, guests can stroll through the Liberdade Avenue, which features a variety of restaurants and cafés serving traditional Portuguese meals and international dishes. Guests are welcome to relax in the lounge bar, where refreshing drinks are served.

The Marquês de Pombal Square is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon’s nightlife in the Bairro Alto is a 5-minute drive away, with all its bars and cafés. The Chiado is a 7-minute drive and features plenty of local cafés and shops for guests to browse. Another nearby historical area is the Rossio, just a 4-minute drive away.

The Marquês de Pombal Metro Station is 350 metres from the property and connects with most of the Lisbon area. Other nearby stations include the Rato, at 500 metres and Avenida, at 600 metres’ distance. Lisbon International Airport is a 13-minute drive from the Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade. An airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge.

Name: DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse is situated in Lisbon. The property is located 2.2 km from Rossio, 2.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.8 km from Commerce Square.

DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse offers a terrace and 2 shared kitchens where guests can prepare their meals.

Chiado is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Liberty Avenue is 3.5 km from the property.

Name: Dinya Lisbon Hotel
Description:
Dinya Lisbon Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 220 metres from Saldanha Metro and 100 metres from the closest bus stop. It features a bar, 24-hour reception desk and free WiFi.

All guest bedrooms at Dinya Lisbon Hotel are equipped with an en-suite bathroom. In addition, every room features cableTV and air conditioning.

Continental breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s spacious breakfast area.

The Dinya is situated 2.5 km from Castelo de São Jorge and 3 km from the Tagus River. Lisbon International Airport is only 5 km away.

The hotel offers a car rental service on site (upon request and upon availability).

Name: Chiado Arty Flats
Description:
Located at just a 5-minute walk from Camões Square, Chiado Arty Flats offers accommodation in a prime location within historic Lisbon. It is next to the lively streets of trendy Bairro Alto and features a unique industrial-style décor from an award-winning architect, within a building that once housed the República newspaper.

Featuring apartments and studios, Chiado Arty Flats has air-conditioned units some featuring balconies and/or city views. Each comes with a bathroom, which has a shower with metal plates. There is a comfortable living area, complete a satellite flat-screen TV and sofas made out of large tubings. All are self-catering, with either a full kitchen or an equipped kitchenette. There are pictures of Bairro Alto's grafittis on the walls and metal barrels are fashioned as washbasins and as tables. A Nespresso coffee machine is featured in all accommodation types. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the studio or apartment, using the kitchen or the kitchenette at their disposal. Alternatively, guests can visit the many restaurants on offer within a 5-minute walk and try out the famed Portuguese cuisine. Both Chiado and Bairro Alto are filled with popular restaurants, bars, cafés and eateries.

Rossio is just 600 metres away, while the high end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are within a 10-minute walk. At 500 metres is Baixa-Chiado Metro Station, which provides connection to most of the city's more renowned areas. The São Pedro de Alcântara Belvedere is at a 3-minute walk, providing sweeping views over Lisbon's rooftops and monuments. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 7 km from the property. The airport is reachable via metro ride.

Name: Portas do Teatro Apartments
Description:
Portas do Teatro Apartament is located in the historical neighborhood of Castelo on a 19th century building next to Lisbon's Roman Theater. Some of the property's apartments overlook the Tagus River and the city. It is within a quiet street in Lisbon's historic center and features free WiFi access.

Blending old and modern décor and featuring parquet floors, these 5 different self catering apartments come with a double and a twin bedroom, a dining room and a living room with flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each has fans and heating. The kitchens are equipped with all modern appliances.

Guests can taste local specialties and classic Portuguese food at the several cafes and restaurants within a 3-minute walk.

The Castle of S. Jorge is a 2-minute walk from Portas do Teatro Apartments, while the Lisbon Cathedral is a 4-minute walk away. Terreiro do Paço Square, with a metro station and bus stops, is a 10-minute walk away.

Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just 800 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.4 km from Rossio, Lisbon Wine House - Rooms & Suites provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. This recently renovated bed and breakfast is located 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.1 km from Commerce Square. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the bed and breakfast have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a seating area. At the bed and breakfast, all units come with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.5 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: MàHouse GuestHouse
Description:
Set in Lisbon and with Lisbon Oceanarium reachable within 2.4 km, MàHouse GuestHouse offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.5 km from Gare do Oriente. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services.

Certain units in the guest house have private entrance and are equipped with desk and outdoor furniture. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in some units, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the guest house, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Bike hire and car hire are available at this guest house and the area is popular for hiking. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 6.6 km from the guest house, while Rossio is 7.5 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: Travessa Houses
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Travessa Houses provides accommodation with balcony, around 1.4 km from Rossio. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 500 metres away.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, inner courtyard views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Name: Next Level Premium Hotels
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, Next Level Premium Hotels is located 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.9 km from Rossio. The property is situated 1.8 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.2 km from Commerce Square and 3.4 km from St. George's Castle. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving American and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Name: HF Fenix Lisboa
Description:
Located on the central Marquês de Pombal, this non-smoking hotel features soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and picturesque views of the city. At just 10 metres from a metro stop, the property offers free WiFi access, car rental services and organizes citywide tours.

All rooms at HF Fénix Lisboa offer a well-lit work desk and have access to cable channels. Each air-conditioned room has its own safety deposit box.

Espaço Jardim Restaurant serves Portuguese and European dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Coffee from a Nespresso machine is available in the mornings, while drinks or apéritif can be enjoyed on in the garden’s furnished terrace.

The staff at Fénix Lisboa can arrange laundry pick-up and delivery services. Guests can also make use of the indoor parking facilities, which is open throughout the day (surcharges apply).

HF Fénix Lisboa is a 10-minute drive from Bairro Alto’s entertainment venues. It is less than 100 metres away from Avenida da Liberdade’s designer shops and historic buildings.Parque Eduardo VII is across the street from the property. Reachable via metro, Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7.7 km from the hotel.

Name: Home Lisbon Hostel
Description:
Located within a 4-minute walk from Baixa/Chiado area and its’ metro station, Home Lisbon Hotel offers accommodation in the heart of Lisbon. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each of the 4 dorm rooms at Home Lisbon Hotel features air conditioning, a shared bathroom with a shower and, in the female dormitories, guests will find a hairdryer.

There is a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen at the property and home cooked meals can be served. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants and cafés can be found in the vicinity.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a library and a living area, where guests can relax or watch a film.

Rossio is 400 metres from the property, while the São Jorge Castle is 800 metres away and the lively Bairro Alto area is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 7 km from Home Lisbon Hostel, and can be easily accessed by metro.

We do not accept groups larger than 8.

Name: Flores Guest House
Description:
Flores Guest House offers accommodation in central Lisbon, 800 metres from Bairro Alto and 1.5 km from Baixa/Chiado. It features free WiFi and has accommodation in room, studios and apartments.

Each unit has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and guests will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the accommodation. All feature a private bathroom, fitted with a shower. The apartments and studios are self-catering.

Within a 1-minute walk, restaurants, bars and shops can be find in the neighborhood.

You will find dry cleaning services at the property. Flores Guest House only features access via staircase and has no lift access.

Name: Esqina Urban Lodge
Description:
Set in Lisbon's historic centre, Esqina Urban Lodge is a short 3-minute walk from Chiado and a 2-minute walk from Rossio Square. The Tagus riverside area and Commerce Square are at a 6-minute walk, while Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is within 80 metres.

The property features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. and include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and a hairdryer.

The surrounding area offers a wide range of restaurants, cafés and shops, many within a short walk from the accommodation.

At a 10-minute walk is Bairro Alto, while Avenida da Liberdade is within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Esqina Urban Lodge. The airport is accessible via metro.

Name: Residentas Arco do Bandeira
Description:
Featuring city views, Residentas Arco do Bandeira is situated in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, less than 1 km from St. George's Castle and a 2-minute walk from Rossio. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Commerce Square, and within 1.4 km of the city centre.

All units at the aparthotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Name: Ambiente Hostel
Description:
Ambiente Hostel is located in Lisbon's well known Almirante Reis Street, at a 5-minute walk from Arroios and Anjos metro stations. Rossio is an 8-minute metro ride from the property, while Chiado is at a 10-minute ride.

The hostel's building dates back to 1900 and the property was fully renovated in 2015. Featuring a lift, it has 4 private rooms and an 8-bed dormitory. Every room is fitted with a shared bathroom. Ambiente Hostel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchen at their disposal, which has free coffee and some snacks throughout the day. Alternatively, Lisbon's historic dowtown has a wide range of popular restaurants, cafés and pastry shops for guests to discover.

Avenida da Liberdade is a 20-minute walk from Ambiente Hostel. Alfama, the city's famed Fado district, is 2.3 km away.  The iconic São Jorge Castle is 2.5 km away. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 5.4 km km from the property and is accessible via metro.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Airport, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Just a 5-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport, this 3-star hotel offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV. Facilities include a 24-hour reception.

The air-conditioned rooms of Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Airport are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a work desk, tea and coffee making facilities, and an en suite bathroom.

Continental buffet breakfast is served daily and includes Portuguese pastries. An express menu is available daily from 19:00 till 22:00 in the hotel's Great Hall.

Express Lisbon Airport is a 5-minute walk from many restaurants. The Vasco da Gama shopping centre is just a 7-minute drive away. Lisbon’s historic centre is 9.7 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

Name: Casas São Julião
Description:
Casas São Julião offers accommodation within 1.8 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property offers soundproof units and is set 300 metres from Commerce Square.

All units at the apartment complex come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Name: Hotel Dom Sancho I
Description:
Hotel Dom Sancho I is located on the tree-lined Avenida Da Liberdade, close to Lisbon’s shopping and entertainment districts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The hotel offers spacious rooms with dark wood furnishings and each room is equipped with air conditioning and a work desk. Some rooms at the Dom Sancho are fitted with flat-screen TVs.

A varied buffet breakfast is served each morning.

Dom Sancho Hotel provides a 24-hour front desk and a car rental service. Laundry and ironing services are also available.

The hotel is close to the historic Parque Eduardo VII, and is less than 10-minutes by car to Portela Airport.

Name: Alfama Terrace
Description:
Featuring equipped terraces with seating-dining areas and a barbecue, Alfama Terrace is located in one of Lisbon's oldest and quaintest neighbourhoods, Alfama, a 12-minute walk from S. Jorge Castle. It offers a 24-hour reception.

With antique wood or original stone floors, the modern, self-contained apartments at Alfama Terrace offer all of today's modern conveniences including free Wi-Fi access and flat-screen TVs with over 100 international cable channels.

Guests can prepare their meals in the fully equipped kitchen, complete with all the necessary utensils, or outdoors on the shared terrace, at the stone barbecue.

All the air-conditioned apartments overlook the private terraces, where guests can relax with a book, enjoy a drink or simply admire the peaceful views of the Pantheon. The streets surrounding Alfama Terrace offer a wide variety of restaurants, bars, cafés and shops.

The Santa Apolónia Train, Metro and Bus Station is a 3-minute walk away, and the Lisbon International Airport is only 15 minutes away by taxi.

Name: Zenit Lisboa
Description:
Located on a leafy avenue in central Lisbon, Zenit offers contemporary accommodation with attention to details. It provides direct access to the Baixa via Saldana Metro Stop and includes a well-equipped gym.

Fitted with designer furnishings, rooms at Zenit Lisboa feature free Wi-Fi and a cable TV. There is also a work desk and en suite bathrooms with hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy modern international cuisine in a casual setting at the at Traste Restaurant. The on-site lobby bar serves renowned Portuguese wines and local spirits until late in the evening.

Popular nearby attractions include the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum, 1 km away and Parque Eduardo VII, a 10-minute walk from the Zenit Lisboa hotel. The reception is open 24/7 and can arrange car rental services.

Name: Rita & Marino Apartment
Description:
Offering city views, Rita & Marino Apartment is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.2 km from Rossio and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is situated 1.9 km from Commerce Square, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 90 metres away.

Name: samesame living
Description:
Samesame living provides accommodation within 1.4 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster. It is located 400 metres from Rossio and features a lift. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.1 km away and Luz Football Stadium is 7.1 km from the apartment.

Accessible via private entrance, all units have air conditioning, soundproofing, desk and a private bathroom with a shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from samesame living.

Name: Majesticlara Lisbon Guest House
Description:
Offering quiet street views, Majesticlara Lisbon Guest House is an accommodation situated in Lisbon, 4.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 4.9 km from Rossio. The property is located 5 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 5.4 km from Commerce Square and 6.1 km from St. George's Castle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Luz Football Stadium is 3.9 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a shared bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the bed and breakfast.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 6.6 km from the bed and breakfast, while Gare do Oriente is 6.9 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Centrally located between Avenida República and Avenida Berna, this hotel is located 10-minutes metro ride or drive away from downtown Lisbon. Its modern rooms feature a flat-screen TV. Facilities include a fitness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental are decorated with warm colours and parquet floors. All rooms have an electric kettle, a work desk, and an en suite bathroom.

Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental’s staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide guests with packed lunches and car rental. Fitness salon access is free of charge.

Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental’s restaurant serves a rich American breakfast, international dishes, and traditional Portuguese dishes. Room service is available.

Guests can walk to Museu Calouste Gulbenkian and Campo Pequeno Metro Station. The International Fair of Lisbon and the Lisbon Congress Centre are just 15 minutes away by metro.

Name: Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5
Description:
Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5 is set in the Misericordia district of Lisbon, 1.7 km from St. George's Castle, 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. It is located 1.1 km from Rossio and provides free WiFi plus a lift. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Commerce Square.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Jeronimos Monastery is 5.9 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 11 km from Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5.

Name: Pensão Londres
Description:
Pensão Londres is perched at the top of the iconic Bairro Alto, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Lisbon. This charming guest house combines timeless elegance with modern comfort, featuring free Wi-Fi and tastefully furnished rooms equipped with satellite TV. Many rooms also include a private balcony, perfect for soaking in the city's unique atmosphere.

The top-floor rooms are particularly special, providing stunning vistas of Lisbon's skyline, the Tagus River, and the historic Castelo de São Jorge. These landmarks, along with many of Lisbon's most famous attractions, are just a short walk from the guest house, making it an ideal base for exploring the city.

On the ground floor of Pensão Londres, guests will find a delightful café and bakery serving freshly baked Portuguese bread and pastries—a perfect way to start the day or enjoy a mid-afternoon treat.

The surrounding Bairro Alto neighborhood is renowned for its vibrant character. By day, it offers family-friendly restaurants, traditional markets, and charming cobbled streets. By night, it transforms into one of Lisbon's liveliest areas, filled with music and energy. Just around the corner, guests can visit the Miradouro de São Pedro de Alcântara, a scenic viewpoint offering spectacular views of Lisbon's historic center.

Whether you're here to explore Lisbon's rich history or immerse yourself in its dynamic culture, Pensão Londres provides a welcoming retreat in the heart of it all.

Name: H10 Duque de Loule
Description:
Offering a restaurant, H10 Duque de Loule is located in Lisbon. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also a coffee machine. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box and bed linen.

At H10 Duque de Loule you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a ticket service and a tour desk.

The hotel is 500 metres from Liberty Avenue, 1.3 km from Amoreiras and 1.6 km from Rossio. Lisbon Portela Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Lutecia Smart Design Hotel
Description:
Set in the residential area of Avenida de Roma, this 4-star design hotel was recently renovated and features 9 themed floors, as well as a fusion restaurant serving Portuguese cuisine. The Roma-Areeiro Metro Station is about 200 meters away.

The guest rooms of Lutecia Smart Design Hotel include high-tech furniture, such as design chairs and Smart TVs. All rooms come with an espresso coffee machine and most offer panoramic city views. The suites include a comfortable living area and a luxurious bathroom with a spa bath.

InFusion restaurant offers à la carte dining in a modern atmosphere. The menu includes several vegetarian alternatives. Lutecia’s room service enables guests to enjoy their meals privately.

In the morning, you can enjoy an expansive buffet breakfast featuring hot dishes, fresh fruit and cakes. A selection of beverages and light snacks is available at the lobby bar, together with several large flat-screen TVs.

Lutecia Smart Design Hotel is located close to the lively Avenida de Roma. Rossio Square and the Baixa are a short ride on the Green Metro Line.

Name: Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 3.3 km from Gare do Oriente, Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the hotel also boast a city view. The units have a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 10 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 1 km away.

Name: HF Fenix Urban
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the HF Fénix Urban is a modern 4-star non-smoking hotel offering free Wi-Fi and contemporary guestrooms with flat screen TVs.

HF Fénix Urban’s Parque Restaurant serves a wide range of international cuisine and regional dishes.  There is also a hotel bar, where guests can enjoy the relaxed atmosphere while having a drink.

The bright, airy rooms have a minibar stocked with drink and refreshments. HF Fénix Urban offers breakfast in the room for those who wish to stay in the comfort of their room.

Lisbon’s famous Parque Eduardo VII is just a few minutes’ walk from HF Fénix Urban.  The city's historical centre and Avenida de Liberdade is a short drive away.

Name: Bairro Alto Bronze of Art Apartments
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.8 km from Commerce Square and 1.5 km from Rossio, Bairro Alto Bronze of Art Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

St. George's Castle is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel White Lisboa
Description:
Located in Saldanha, within Lisbon's centre, the elegant Hotel White Lisboa is in front of Saldanha Metro Station. It is 1.8 km from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. Hotel White Lisboa features an outdoor swimming pool and views of the city.

With a predominantly clean and light décor, the rooms and suites at the hotel include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units include a seating area where guests can relax. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, with slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel White Lisboa features free WiFi throughout the property.

A daily breakfast is provided and is served in the property's breakfast room. Guests of the hotel can discover the traditionally rich Portuguese cuisine in of the many restaurants in the surrounding area, many at a 5-minute walk. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Amoreiras is 1.9 km from Hotel White Lisboa, while the Atrium Saldanha shopping centre is just 750 metres away. The popular historic downtown area of the city is accessible within a 15 to 20-minute metro ride and includes areas like Rossio, Chiado, Commerce Square and lively Bairro Alto. São Jorge Castle, an iconic city landmark, is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.2 km from Hotel White Lisboa and is accessible via metro.

Name: Light of Lisbon Apartments I
Description:
Offering free WiFi and river views, Light of Lisbon Apartments I is an accommodation located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.2 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio. The property features city views and is 1.7 km from St. George's Castle and 1.1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and fridge, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Casa Oliver Boutique B&B - Principe Real
Description:
Located in Praça do Príncipe Real Square, Casa Oliver Príncipe Real is set in a renovated historical complex with several buildings and offers rooms with modern designs with large windows and free WiFi. Rato Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Casa Oliver provides individually decorated rooms with wooden floors and a retro décor. They come with a flat-screen TV, open closet and a private bathroom.

A variety of restaurants can be found within a walking distance. Staff can arrange dinner reservations, car rentals, babysitting, laundry and many other services.

The Belvedere of São Pedro de Alcântara, which provides views over Lisbon, is within walking distance of Casa Oliver. The lively Bairro Alto district is just a 10-minutes walk away. The historical Chiado area, featuring a wide variety of shops and boutiques, is just a 12-minute walk from the property. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km from Casa Oliver and can be easily accessed by metro.

Name: Figueira by The Beautique Hotels & Spa
Description:
Figueira by The Beautique Hotels & SPA offers unique experiences and overlooks the São Jorge Castle. Centrally located in Lisbon, this charm hotel is just 400 metres from the iconic Rossio Train Station.

Sophisticated rooms at The Beautique Hotels Figueira present an exclusive décor with earthy tones and fig tree details. All rooms include an espresso machine and an iPod docking station. Bathrooms come with slippers and bathrobe. Enjoy a wide variety of treatments and relax in the SPA Figueira without leaving the comfort of the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served daily and the restaurant serves traditional Portuguese delicacies. The award-winner Nini Andrade e Silva was in charge of the hotel’s interior design, including the restaurant.

Rua Augusta, Lisbon’s shopping street is a 1-minute walk.

This boutique hotel provides a 24-hour reception, where an airport shuttle can be organised to Lisbon International Airport, located a 12-minute drive. The nearby train station offers links to Sintra in a 30-minute ride. The lively Bairro Alto district is a 10-minute walk from The Beautique Hotels Figueira.

Name: Rossio Garden Hotel
Description:
Dating back to 1900, the 24-hour Rossio Garden Hotel is a newly refurbished boutique hotel located in the heart of Lisbon historic centre, a 1-minute walk from Rossio Train Station.

The rooms were designed by the Portuguese fashion designer, João Rôlo. They all include a flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a shower.

The location of the Garden Hotel offers guests the opportunity of walking to the nearby dining options either in Rossio, or Alfama, or Chiado. Bairro Alto is a 12-minute walk away.

Enjoy the sun on a summer terrace on your way to São Jorge Castle, located a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Rua Augusta shopping street is 400 metres from the hotel, as well as Chiado district.

Shuttle service is available to Lisbon International Airport. Restauradores Metro Station is within 1-minute walk.

Name: Lisboa Central Hostel
Description:
Located just off lofty Avenida da Liberdade, this hostel offers shared and private accommodation and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. It hosts daily cultural events.

Bright colours and parquet floors provide an airy feel to the rooms. Shared rooms offer bunk beds, while private rooms come with 2 single beds and a wardrobe for storing clothes.

Each morning a continental breakfast is served in the hostel’s dining area. Guests can sample free tasty milkshakes on Milkshake Monday and drinks are available from the bar as well as from vending machines.

Lisboa Central Hostel features a lounge area with flat-screen TV, perfect for relaxing after a day of city exploration. It also offers a laundry service, luggage storage room and a 24-hour reception desk.

Marques de Pombal Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from Lisboa Hostel, linking directly to the inner city.

Name: Zurin Charm Hotel
Description:
Well set in the Campolide district of Lisbon, Zurin Charm Hotel is set 3.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.7 km from Commerce Square and 4.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.1 km from Rossio.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Zurin Charm Hotel have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

St. George's Castle is 4.3 km from Zurin Charm Hotel, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Mercure Lisboa
Description:
With a top-floor pool featuring glass walls and roof, Mercure Lisboa offers spacious accommodation, a 5-minute walk from Lisbon Zoo. It features free Wi-Fi access and provides child services.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Mercure Lisboa all come with large double-glazed windows and a seating area. They include a TV, radio and a private bathroom with bath.

Guests can enjoy traditional specialities and some continental classics at the restaurant. The on-site lobby bar serves fresh drinks, renowned Portuguese wines and local spirits.

Popular nearby attractions include the Gulbenkian Museum, a 5-minute walk from the Mercure Lisboa Hotel. Sete Rios Metro Station is 300 metres away and has direct links to central Rossio Square.

Name: Hotel Principe Avila
Description:
Attractively situated in Lisbon, Hotel Principe Avila features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Guests can make use of a bar.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer, while some rooms at the hotel also boast a balcony. The units have a safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is available at Hotel Principe Avila.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 3.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Description:
Porta do Mar Deluxe Central Apartments offers accommodation within 1.9 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is set 400 metres from Commerce Square and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, a hair dryer and a desk. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.
