Name: TURIM Av. Liberdade Hotel
Description:
Situated at Avenida da Liberdade, Hotel Turim Av. Liberdade is a modern 4-star hotel. It is completely non-smoking and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a minibar. Facilities include a 24-hour reception and room service.

The rooms at Turim Av. Liberdade Hotel are decorated with contemporary furnishings and natural colours. All rooms have internet TV and an en suite bathroom with oversized mirrors.

Guests can enjoy Portuguese dishes and international fare at Turim Av. Liberdade's restaurant. The bar offers a variety of drinks and snacks.

This Turim Hotel offers a laundry service along with a car rental. There is also a business centre with computer terminals.

Lisbon’s city centre is 2 km away, where guests can visit the Castle of São Jorge and the Lisbon Cathedral. Marques De Pombal Metro Station is just 2 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel
Description:
This renovated hotel in the heart of Lisbon’s Parque das Naçoes is surrounded by trendy restaurants. It offers free Wi-Fi, a brand new restaurant and renovated spacious rooms. Private indoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Rooms at Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel are bright and airy and have satellite TV, a seating area and a tea/coffee maker. They overlook the former EXPO 98 site and its many innovative buildings. Some rooms also look out over the water.

The brand new restaurant serves international breakfasts and offers an à la carte service and a dish of the day, based on the Bistrô & Tapas concept.

The famous Oceanarium and the Lisbon Casino are also close by. Lisbon city centre can be reached within 15 minutes using public transport.

The Meliá Lisboa Oriente is a short walk from the Gare do Oriente station and is only 3 km from Lisbon International Airport. The area is well-served by Lisbon’s Metro as well as trains and buses.

Name: My Suite Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real
Description:
My Suite Lisbon features accommodation in suites and studios in Lisbon’s historical centre. The units are just 700 metres from historical Chiado and are in the lively Bairro Alto area.

All come with a living area with sofas, flat-screen cable TV and an iPod docking station. Each includes a kitchenette, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries. One of the suites enjoys views over the garden.

The kitchenette allows guests the freedom to cook their own meals in comfort. Bairro Alto has a wide range of restaurants eateries and bars, many within a 5-minute walk.

Chiado is Lisbon’s historical downtown and has several typical cafés and shops. Alfama is 3.8 km away and features many Fado houses. Portela International Airport is 9.2 km from the My Suite Lisbon.

Name: WC by The Beautique Hotels
Description:
Located in Lisbon's famed Almirante Reis Street, 900 metres from the historic downtown, WC by The Beautique Hotels is a uniquely decorated hotel. The property's décor was carefully designed to express the cleanliness and comfort of a modern bathroom.

All of the comfortable and soundproofed rooms are elegantly furnished and come equipped with a Smart TV. Each also includes a coffee machine, with complimentary capsules. The rooms also features a private bathroom, with free toiletries. WC by The Beautique Hotels has free WiFi throughout the property.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning at the restaurant area. The surrounding area features a wide range of restaurants, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk.

Intendente Metro Station is at the doorstep. Historic Rossio is 1.4 km from WC by The Beautique Hotels, while Chiado is 1 km away. Bairro Alto is at 2 km and the property is 1.3 km from Liberty Avenue’s high-end shops and boutiques. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 6.5 km from the property.

Name: Radisson Blu Hotel Lisbon
Description:
Radisson Blu Lisbon is a 4-star hotel, conveniently located less than 2 km from Portela International Airport. At just 100 metres from Campo Grande Metro Station, the hotel has a 24-hour fitness centre, 12 conference rooms and high-speed WiFi access throughout.

The comfortable rooms and suites at the Radisson Blu have modern amenities and wooden flooring. They include cable TV, a tea/coffee maker and seating area, as well as a convenient trouser press, which guests can use on their suits after unpacking. Some rooms have a double sofa bed. The private marble bathrooms are equipped with quality amenities. Suites also feature an espresso machine, with complimentary coffee.

The Bordalo Pinheiro Restaurant serves a rich buffet for breakfast, starting at 06:30, including vegetarian and vegan options. Guests on a hurry in the early morning will find a Grab and Run counter in the lobby from 05:00 onward, with coffee and snacks. Lunch and dinner service is also available at the restaurant, with a focus on Mediterranean cuisine and à la carte or buffet options.

The Malhoa Bar features cocktails, live piano music on select nights and also has a big screen TV, broadcasting football and other sports. An express laundry service is available, upon request and at an extra fee. The fitness centre is available to all guests at anytime, by using the room's keycard for access. The Radisson's lobby area features sofas. Indoor private parking is available.

The city's business district, Parque das Nações, is at a 10-minute drive from the Radisson Blu Hotel Lisbon. The Alvalade XXI Stadium, home of Sporting C.P., is within a 5-minute walk, while Luz Stadium, home of S.L. Benfica, is within 3 km. The nearby metro station offers easy access to Lisbon's historic downtown area, including trendy Bairro Alto, Chiado, Rossio, Commerce Square and even Avenida da Liberdade.

St. George's Castle is 1.3 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from WHome | Luxury Chiado Prime Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Jupiter Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Located halfway between Saldanha and Campo Pequeno, Jupiter Lisboa is a newly built hotel featuring a panoramic rooftop with 2 outdoor swimming pools as well as a SPA, a Portuguese  restaurant and a lobby bar with food and drinks.

Preserving its original 1906 architecture, Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s spacious rooms are decorated with images of Lisbon and are equipped with free WiFi, air conditioning, soundproofing, a flat-screen TV and a work desk. Each private bathroom comes with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The on-site restaurant serves a hot breakfast buffet every morning and includes a varied menu with international and traditional Portuguese dishes. The Lisboa Amada lobby bar has a variety of drinks and snacks. A 24-hour room service is available for guests’ convenience. In the summer time there's also a rooftop bar, available for snacks and drinks.

Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s 24-hour front desk can provide a variety of services including a shuttle service, bicycle and car rental, ticket service, luggage storage and a concierge service. Private underground parking is available, at an extra fee. The hotel has 3 fully equipped meeting rooms. There is a 24-hour fitness centre available, free of charge. The BluSpa at Jupiter Lisboa Hotel, features an indoor treatments pool, sauna, steam bath and a complete massages and treatments menu. These services are not included in the rate.

The Baixa Pombalina and Chiado shopping areas are just a 15-minute metro trip away and both Luz and Alvalade Football Stadiums are within 4 km. Lisbon International Airport is 4 km away.

Name: Vincci Liberdade
Description:
Primely set next to Lisbon’s poshest street, Avenida da Liberdade, this 4-star hotel is located in the city centre. Sited in a renovated historical building, Vincci Liberdade includes a restaurant, bar and private parking.

The hotel’s elegant and modern rooms all come with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned units also feature a private bathroom and most also have a small seating area.

Breakfast service is available and is served each morning at the hotel’s restaurant. Guests wishing to enjoy lunch or dinner at the hotel’s restaurant will be able to choose from a menu that includes various Portuguese specialities, as well as some international dishes.

The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to assist guests. Staff will be more than happy to help guests with suggestions of the best nearby spots and eateries. At the end of a day touring Lisbon, guests can relax in the lounge area with a drink or cocktail from the hotel’s bar.

The Vincci is just steps from trendy Avenida da Liberdade, famed for being the site for numerous high-end shops and boutiques. Avenida Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk and features connections with most of the city’s emblematic areas. Rossio is a 9-minute metro ride, while Chiado and Bairro Alto are a 12-minute metro ride away. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 8 km from Vincci Liberdade and is also accessible via metro.

Description:
Located in Lisbon, Oriente DNA Studios are 8 apartments situated just 750 metres from the trendy Parque das Nações district. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi and is 500 metres from the iconic Gare do Oriente Transport Hub.

The apartments include a living area with a sofa and a cable TV. The shared terrace has a seating area where guests can relax while enjoying a glass of wine. Each apartment features a private bathroom.

Name: Hotel Luena
Description:
Set in Lisbon, Hotel Luena is at a 10-minute walk from Saldanha and is 400 metres from the Arroios Metro Station. A daily breakfast buffet is provided.

The hotel's rooms come with free WiFi, air conditioning, parquet floors and a flat-screen cable TV. Featuring a bath tub, the private bathroom in each room also comes with a hairdryer.

Guests can relax in the shared lounge and there is also an onsite bar.

Marquês de Pombal Square and the gardens of Eduardo VII Park are at a 20-minute walk. Within a 25-minute walk are the high-end shops and boutiques at Avenida da Liberdade. Lisbon's historic downtown area is reachable through a 20-minute metro ride. Humberto Delgado International Airport is within 4.4 km from Hotel Luena.

Name: Portugal Here I Come Conde Redondo
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Rossio and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Portugal Here I Come Conde Redondo offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and kettle. This apartment features free private parking and a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Commerce Square is 2.7 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Lisbon Style
Description:
The Lisbon Style is a modern accommodation located in the Lisbon city centre. It is 170 metres from the Anjos Metro Station, which connects with most the city.

Featuring a unique décor, the rooms feature walls painted with renowned Lisbon locations and monuments. All rooms feature a private bathroom. Guests of the apartments enjoy access to a private kitchen, living room with a sofas and a TV. The rooms are accessible via staircase.

Chiado, Lisbon’s downtown area is a 10-minute drive away. Rossio, a 7-minute drive, has various shops and cafés. 4 km away is Bairro Alto, the city’s main bar area. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Lisbon Style.

Name: Portas do Castelo Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of the city a 2-minute walk from the panoramic São Jorge Castle and Sé Cathedral, in a typical Lisbon district, the apartments of Portas do Sol Apartments offer city and Tagus River views.

The unit is sited in a renovated 19th century building. All apartments feature a terrace or garden and are located at one of Lisbon's most iconic staircases, providing guests the rare quietude of a street without traffic. Units blend classical elements and architecture with a contemporary décor, creating an eclectic atmosphere. Each apartment has an iPod docking station, free WiFi and a satellite TV.

The apartment’s kitchens are fully equipped to prepare meals, which can be enjoyed al fresco. The apartments’ restaurant, bar and lounge is located a few steps away, with fantastic views of the city and a summer terrace.

Portas do Sol features a meeting room located 200 metres from the apartments, which guests can use upon previous request and at an extra charge. Babysitting services are also available.

Santa Apolónia Metro Station is 1 km away, and Lisbon International Airport is 10 km away from Portas do Sol. The quaint Alfama district, with its cobbled streets and restaurants with Fado music, is 500 metres away. The Lisbon Cathedral is a 1-minute walk away while the historical Chiado area is a 5-minute walk.

Name: room Select Liberdade
Description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lisbon, room Select Liberdade features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is allergy-free and is situated 700 metres from Rossio.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English, Spanish and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near room Select Liberdade include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: Garcia Place
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just less than 1 km from Rossio and a 9-minute walk from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Garcia Place provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is situated 6.2 km from Luz Football Stadium, 7.4 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 8.8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a walk-in shower. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Garcia Place include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

Name: WOT Lisbon Nomad
Description:
WOT Lisbon Nomad features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The hostel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Rossio is 2.9 km from WOT Lisbon Nomad, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

Name: Portas da Sé Apartments
Description:
Set on a 19th century building next to the Cathedral, Portas da Sé Apartments features a blend of antique and modern decor. It is located between the Alfama and Baixa districts.

With free WiFi, the self-catering apartments come with a dining and living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV. The kitchen are fully equipped and both have a twin and a double room.

Guests can taste local specialities and classic Portuguese food at the cafes and restaurants in the immediate surroundings.

The Castle of S. Jorge is 600 metres from Portas da Sé Apartments. Praça do Comércio, where guests can take any kind of public transportation, is a 6-minute walk away.

Name: Green Heart Hostel
Description:
Green Heart Hostel is a lively youth-oriented hostel located in the Portuguese capital, 500 metres from central Marquês de Pombal Square. Featuring free WiFi, this property organizes regular dinner parties, has a shared lounge area and after-hours parties.

The property features accommodation in dormitories, as well as in private single and double rooms. All come with access to shared bathroom facilities.

Guests may make full use of the communal kitchen at their disposal. The comfortable shared lounge includes a dining area. Alternatively, several restaurants are available within a short 5-minute walk.

Avenida da Liberdade is 500 metres away and features several name brand boutiques and fashion stores. Historical Chiado is at a 9-minute drive and has several traditional cafés and shops. São Jorge Castle is a 10-minute drive and Bairro Alto is 3 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km from the Green Heart Hostel.

Name: Olissippo Oriente
Description:
Olissippo Oriente is located in Lisbon’s Parque das Nações, just 300 metres from the Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and at a 4-minute walk from the Oriente Station transport hub, which has connectios with the city's historic centre. Lisbon's popular Oceanarium is within 500 metres.

The rooms of Olissippo feature a modern interior decorated with wooden furniture. All rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing, a minibar, and a work desk. There's also the option of a spacious junior suite, complete with a comfortable seating area. Room service is available, at an extra fee.

The Olissippo Oriente’s Descobertas restaurant serves a combination of traditional Portuguese dishes and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a variety of snacks and light meals on the shaded terrace at Coffee Shop Oriente.

The reception of Olissippo Oriente is open 24/7. The hotel also offers car rental, fax and photocopying services, and laundry facilities.

The Lisbon Casino is a mere 3-minute walk from the hotel. Altice Arena, site of various concerts and entertainment events is at 500 metres. Feira Internacional de Lisboa is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is just 3 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: House Sao Bento
Description:
House Sao Bento is a recovered historical building located in Lisbon. Set in a quiet and safe area, this guest house provides free WiFi access.

Featuring crafted ceilings and 1960’s frescoes, the rooms at House Sao Bento are equipped with desks. The suite includes a private bathroom and the remaining rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities. Linen and towels are provided.

Guests may use the shared kitchen to prepare their own meals and relax at the shared lounge available. Within 300 metres guests will find a great variety of restaurants serving traditional Portuguese cuisine. The lively Bairro Alto, situated a 12-minute walk, is the perfect place to end the evening since it is filled with plenty of bars to choose from.

Laundry, dry cleaning services as well as grocery deliveries are available for a surcharge. Staff can arrange a car rental service upon request.

The shopping area of Chiado is 1.4 k m away and the historic Alfama neighbourhood is 3 km away. The famous Tram 28 as well as the bus stops in front of the guest house entrance and the Santos Train Station is a 10-minute walk away. For an additional cost, an airport shuttle for the Lisbon Portela Airport, located 7 km away, can be provided.

Name: Amazing river view in historical Lisbon
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.1 km from Commerce Square, Amazing river view in historical Lisbon provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. With quiet street views, this accommodation offers a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from St. George's Castle.

The apartment with a balcony and river views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

Rossio is 1.3 km from Amazing river view in historical Lisbon, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel provides contemporary accommodation within Lisbon’s iconic Parque das Nações, overlooking the Tagus River. It features an indoor pool with a hot tub, relaxation facilities and a refurbished fitness centre.

Renovated and soundproofed rooms at Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel offer catchy interior decorations, most with designer furnishings and stunning views over Lisbon, the Tagus River or the business centre avenue. They all include satellite TV channels and en suite bathrooms with bathtub or shower.

Guests can enjoy enticing cocktails at the Sky Bar which provides panoramic views over Lisbon and the Tagus River.

Popular landmarks nearby the hotel Tivoli Oriente Lisboa include the adjacent Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and Estação do Oriente Station. Lisbon International Airport is just a 5-minute drive away and 3 metro stops (10 minutes) away.

Name: Boutique Telhal 89
Description:
Ideally located in the Santo Antonio district of Lisbon, Boutique Telhal 89 is set 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.6 km from Commerce Square and 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is less than 1 km from Rossio, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with city or quiet street views. At the guest house, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Boutique Telhal 89.

Name: behotelisboa
Description:
Behotelisboa offers accommodation in Lisbon’s historic Pombaline Downtown and is located just 50 metres away from Rua Augusta, Lisbon’s main shopping street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each room at Behotelisboa has a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free toiletries. Breakfast is available and is served next door at Taberna 132 restaurant. Daily cleaning is provided and room service is also available.

Please note that when booking more than 7 rooms, different policies and conditions may apply.

Guests will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike hire and car hire are available.
There is a variety of restaurants available in the surroundings and Rossio and Chiado are a 5-minute walk from behotelisboa. Lively Bairro Alto is 1.1 km away while iconic Alfama is 1.2 km away and is renowned for its many Fado Houses, where guests can enjoy Portuguese food while watching Fado concerts.The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 7 km from the property.

Name: Grande Pensao Residencial Alcobia
Description:
Situated in Lisbon’s city centre, between Martim Moniz and Figueira Square, this hotel offers panoramic views of S. Jorge Castle. Facilities include car and bicycle rental.

The air-conditioned rooms of Grande Pensão Residencial Alcobia are decorated with warm colours, wooden furniture, and parquet floors. All rooms have satellite TV, a hairdryer, and a private bathroom.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast in Grande Residencial Alcobia’s breakfast room.

It is possible to arrange Lisbon city tours at Grande Pensão Residencial Alcobia’s 24-hour reception. WiFi access is available at the lobby, as well as a computer for guests' use.

The Rossio metro station is just 280 metres from of Grande Pensão Residencial Alcobia, and the Lisbon Cathedral is 700 metres away.

Name: Apartment in Santos
Description:
Located near Commerce Square and Rossio, Apartment in Santos is in Lisbon and provides free private parking and a restaurant. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The apartment features family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. Some of the units include a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are fitted with a coffee machine and wine or champagne.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Barbecue facilities are included at the apartment, and guests can also relax in the garden or go on a picnic in the picnic area.

St. George's Castle is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels
Description:
Well situated in Lisbon, Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. The property is set 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 600 metres from St. George's Castle and 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium. Jeronimos Monastery is 8.6 km away and Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.7 km from the hotel.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, the units at Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms come with a balcony. All rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Casa Portuguesa Chiado 25
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 600 metres from Rossio and less than 1 km from Commerce Square, Casa Portuguesa Chiado 25 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 1.4 km from St. George's Castle. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, river views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Name: Ramada by Wyndham Lisbon
Description:
Featuring breathtaking views of Lisbon and the Tagus River, this 4-star hotel is a 10-minute drive from Parque das Nações and the riverside. The hotel's restaurant serves tasty Mediterranean cuisine. The nearest Metro Station is Olaias, just across the street from the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Ramada Lisbon are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a minibar, satellite TV, and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a separate living area.

A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's meal area. The Navegadores restaurant offers stunning views of the Tagus River, and a décor featuring paintings by Luis Pinto Coelho.

Alameda Metro Station is at a 10-minute walk. The venue for Rock in Rio Lisbon, the Bela Vista Park, is 1.4 km from the hotel. Lisbon's historic centre is a 15-minute drive away and features historic areas like Rossio, Chiado and the lively Bairro Alto. The Ramada Lisbon is 4.7 km from Lisbon's Portela International Airport.

Name: Arroios Concept Apartments by Homing
Description:
Offering city views, Arroios Concept Apartments by Homing is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.2 km from Rossio. The property is around 3.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 4.1 km from St. George's Castle and 4.7 km from Commerce Square. Luz Football Stadium is 6.9 km away and Jeronimos Monastery is 10 km from the apartment.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them feature a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area. Name: The Hygge Lisbon Suites - Estrela
Description:
Offering a shared lounge and quiet street view, The Hygge Lisbon Suites - Estrela is situated in Lisbon, 2.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3.3 km from Commerce Square. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.8 km from Rossio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Units include a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and fruits are available each morning.

St. George's Castle is 3.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Altis Grand Hotel
Description:
Featuring a free heated indoor pool, spa and a gym, this recently refurbished 5-star hotel is set in Lisbon’s business district. Altis Grand Hotel is a 2-minute walk from Avenida da Liberdade's fashionable boutiques, and 700 metres from Príncipe Real.

With an elegant and stylish décor of luxurious ebony wood and soft tones, all rooms are soundproofed and equipped with a well-lit working space. WiFi access is free at the Altis Grand Hotel – Luxury Collection Hotels.

Boasting amazing views over Lisbon, Tagus River and S. Jorge Castle, Grill D. Fernando Restaurant offers a range of Portuguese dishes, with emphasis on fresh local fish. The wholesome breakfast features a selection of fresh pastries, including the well-known Pastel de Nata (traditional custard pie).

Avenida Metro Station is 400 metres away from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is at a 7.6 km distance from – Luxury Collection Hotels. Chiado is within a 20-minute walk, as are the bars of Lisbon's trendy Bairro Alto.

Name: M'AR De AR Auria
Description:
Located in one of the main areas in the center of Lisbon, this is the ideal hotel for family holidays, business or leisure trips, and where you will have all kinds of shops and restaurants at your disposal. Our Hotel is just 4.5 Km from the nearest airport which is Humberto Delgado Airport, and has in its surroundings all types of transport to make your visit more comfortable. We are just 350 meters from the Arroios and Saldanha Metro Station and a few meters from the bus stop.
For maximum comfort, our reception is open 24 hours a day. Enjoy the maximum comfort thanks to the completely renovated rooms, with modern furniture and all accessible by elevator. All rooms at the hotel have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a safe, bed linen and towels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided for guests' comfort. Some rooms include a seating area with a sofa and others have a balcony. Wi-Fi access is available free of charge in all areas of the Hotel. Guests also have a place to store their luggage at their disposal.
Lisbon is synonymous with culture. Venture out on the centuries-old tram to Castelo de São Jorge, where you will have the best view over the city. Cross the historic neighborhood of Alfama where you will find Fado and the most typical gastronomy of Lisbon. Stroll through Parque das Nações or through Belém and be sure to visit the Botanical Garden and the most varied shopping centers in the city where you can find all kinds of stores you are looking for. The beaches of Costa da Caparica, Estoril and Cascais are all within 28 km of Lisbon.
The reception staff can help arrange restaurant reservations, car hire, ticket bookings, sightseeing tours and will be happy to inform you of Lisbon's main attractions, entertainment and public transport.

Name: Castle Inn Lisbon Apartments

Set in a renovated traditional building in the heart of Lisbon, Castle Inn Lisbon offers accommodation in the Castelo de São Jorge neighborhood. The property is located within the castle's walls.

It is because access is only for authorized vehicles such as local taxis, 737 buses and some transfers. Ask for more information to property before book transport on internet, to ensure car can access inside castle neighborhood.

The five apartments are decorated with local artists’ works and all come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with towels and toiletries. Some apartments boast views of the Tagus River. Free WiFi access is provided.

There is a kitchenette in each unit where guests can prepare their meals, featuring a toaster, a kettle and an equipped dining area. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in the vicinity. A grocery store is within a 5 minute walk.

There is a bus stop within a 2-minute walk from the property, providing easy connections to different areas of the city. A lift connecting with Lisbon's downtown is a short walk away. The charming Alfama district, known for its traditional Fado music venues, is 750 meters away. Lisbon International Airport is 6.6 km from Castle Inn Lisbon.

The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels offers accommodation in Lisbon's historic downtown, just a 1-minute walk from the Santa Justa Lift. Commerce Square, with its iconic Augusta Street Arch and Tagus River views is at a 4-minute walk.

The 5 floors of the property each has a distinct décor. Every room at this guest house is air conditioned and is equipped with a TV and a coffee machine. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom, with free Castelbel toiletries and a hairdryer. The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels features free WiFi throughout the property.

A daily breakfast is served at the property's breakfast room, which has views over Áurea Street. A wide range of restaurants, cafés and pastry shops are at a short walk.

The Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is 160 metres away, while Rossio Square is a 3-minute walk away. The high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a 7-minute walk. Alfama is a 15-minute walk away and the São Jorge Castle is at 1.2 km. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 8.7 km from The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels. The modern designed rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, minibar, sofa and a wardrobe. Each has an ultra-modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available.

Baixa-Chiado Subway Station is a 2-minute walk away. Lisbon Portela International Airport is a 16-minute drive away by car. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is a private bathroom with bidet in some units, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available each morning.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Palacio Ramalhete
Description:
Set in the stylish area of Janelas Verdes, this boutique hotel is housed in an 18th-century palace. It features rooms with authentic ceramic tiles and a heated pool overlooking the courtyard.

Each spacious room of Palacio Ramalhete is decorated with antique furniture, a flat-screen TV and beautiful wooden floors. Most rooms have a view of the Tagus River. Unique details include stucco ceilings, oak walls or a  fireplace with a copper roof.

A buffet breakfast is served in the spacious common room, or on the patio in warmer months. Ramalhete also has a well-stocked bar with drinks and snacks.

Guests can relax on a designer sun lounger on the poolside deck. The hotel features an outdoor lounge area to enjoy a drink at sunset.

Rua Das Janelas Verdes Bus Stop is less than 50 metres from Palacio Ramalhete. The National Museum of Ancient Art is less than 3 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites
Description:
Featuring a terrace, Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites is situated in the historic centre of Lisbon, at 400 meters from São Jorge Castle and 650 metres from Rossio. The Martim Moniz metro station is a short 3-minute walk from the property and Chiado is 1 km away.

All units at Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites are air-conditioned and feature free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV and a living area with a dining table. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in every unit and towels are offered.

Guests can prepare their meals in the equipped kitchenette, fitted with a stovetop, a microwave, a toaster, a kettle and refrigerator. A variety of restaurants, cafés and supermarkets can be found in the vicinity.

There is a stop of the famous Tram 28 and Escalator to the Castle within a 3-minute walk from the property. Alfama neighbourhood is 400 meters from São Jorge Apartments and the lively Bairro Alto area is 1.6 km away. The Portas do Sol and the Santa Luzia belvederes are at an 8-minute and a 10-minute walk, respectively. The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 6 km away from Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites.

Name: Whome Beato HUB Residences - Perfect for Digital Nomads & Families
Description:
Situated within 3.9 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.9 km of Lisbon Oceanarium in Lisbon, Whome Beato HUB Residences - Perfect for Digital Nomads & Families features accommodation with seating area. The property is around 4.5 km from Commerce Square, 4.8 km from Gare do Oriente and 4.9 km from St. George's Castle. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Rossio is 5 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Metropolitan Living Lisbon - Laranjeiras
Description:
A recently renovated apartment located in Lisbon, Metropolitan Living Lisbon - Laranjeiras features a garden. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchenette facilities, which include a fridge, kettle and a stovetop.

Luz Football Stadium is 2 km from the apartment, while Rossio is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Ey Lisbon GuestHouse
Description:
Offering modern private and shared rooms in central Lisbon, a 5-minute walk from Marquês do Pombal Square and its Metro Station, the Ey Lisbon GuestHouse features free WiFi access.

All the cosy rooms are bright and have modern furnishings. Dorms feature individual reading light and storage space. All have access to shared bathrooms, which come with a hairdryer and showers. Two of the rooms feature balconies with Lisbon street views.

Guests may use the shared kitchen facilities to prepare meals. The shared lounge comes with a TV and comfortable sofas.

The iconic São Jorge Castle is within a 13-minute drive, while lively Bairro Alto's bars are at a 2 km distance from the Ey Lisbon GuestHouse. Avenida da Liberdade is within 5 minutes' walk and is filled with high-end fashion stores and boutiques. The city's historical downtown is a 20-minute walk and has various typical cafés and shops. Lisbon International Airport is less than 8 km from the Ey Lisbon.

Name: Hotel Lisboa Plaza - Lisbon Heritage Collection - Avenida
Description:
Just around the corner from Liberty Avenue, this 4-star family-run hotel offers unique features like a local-style lounge with plush seating. It also features a chic terrace with views of Lisbon.

All rooms at Hotel Lisboa Plaza blend the décor of Portuguese houses with modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and DVD player.

Guests can borrow a book from Lisboa Plaza’s private library and read it beside the fireplace. For those who like to stay fit, there is a well-equipped fitness centre.

In the hands of the same Portuguese family, the Café Plaza Bistro offers buffet breakfast until 12:00 and light meals and snacks all day. The bar serves a variety of drinks.

Hotel Lisboa Plaza is only a 2-minute walk from Avenida Metro Station and just 1 Metro stop from Marquês de Pombal Square and Eduardo VII Park. It is also a 5-minute walk to Glória Funicular/Tram, that connects to Bairro Alto.

Name: Lx Boutique Hotel
Description:
Located in the heart of the triangle between Chiado, Baixa and Cais do Sodré districts, Lx Boutique Hotel offers themed rooms with unique views over Lisbon and Tejo River.

All Boutique Hotel elegant rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a mini-bar, and a private bathroom. There is an iPod docking station, LCD TV and free Wi-Fi in every room.

Guest can enjoy Confraria, a trendy sushi restaurant that also serves a variety of teas, beverages and wines all day. For a typical Portuguese food experience, there are several alternatives just outside the door. Lx Boutique Hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from several restaurants, bars, cafés and shops.

Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk service Lx Boutique Hotel provides. It also offers laundry and car hire services. An airport transfer shuttle is available upon request.

Historical sites and museums such as Lisbon Cathedral, Praça do Comércio, Igreja de São Roque and the Chiado Museum are within a 10-minute walk. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is within a 20-minute drive away or a 40-minute metro journey.

Name: Dear Lisbon - Palace Chiado Suites
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Dear Lisbon - Palace is situated in Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. It is is located in a historic, protected and renovated building from the 19th century, which has the reception on the ground floor and all nine suites on the first floor.

All of the elegantly-decorated suites include a flat-screen cable TV, as well as a mini bar and a safety deposit box. Some units have a seating area where you can relax. Guests can enjoy a view over Lisbon or over São Jorge Castle. All suites are equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine (with some complimentary capsules) and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes bathrobes and slippers.

Front desk is available from 08:00 to 17:00. Breakfast is served in each of the suites, at a specific hour that guests can choose on the previous day.

The guest house also offers bike hire and car hire. Rossio is 400 metres from Dear Lisbon - Palace, while Bairro Alto is a short 3-minute walk away. At a 15-minute walk are the historic Alfama area, as well as the area surrounding São Jorge Castle. The São Pedro de Alcântara Belvedere is a 5-minute walk away. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Maxime Hotel Lisbon
Description:
Formerly known as a cabaret, the Maxime is now reborn as a hotel. The place where spies and dancers from last century dwelt, is now open to guests and Lisbon’s visitors retaining all its former glory.

Always in good care by the mysterious Lady Maxime, guests will enjoy carefully decorated rooms with a variety of themes ranging from the dressing room, the stage or the bondage. Each is air conditioned and comes with a Nespresso machine, a private bathroom with Castelbel amenities, a Marshall speaker and a flat-screen TV.

The bar kept its original counter and hosts a restaurant as well. Guests can enjoy a thematic menu next to the glorious stage, under the original ceiling of the cabaret and surrounded by replicas of the original chandeliers.

Every Friday and Saturday guests can enjoy the Maxime Restaurant & Bar cabaret shows.

Hotel Maxime is just 1-minute walk from the Liberdade Avenue and metro station. Rossio Square is 700 metres away and the Chiado shopping area is a 10-minute walk away. Lisbon Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real
Description:
Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and features a lift. The property offers allergy-free units and is located 800 metres from Rossio.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Commerce Square is 1.5 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Cheese & Wine Lapa
Description:
Featuring a garden and views of inner courtyard, Cheese & Wine Lapa is a recently renovated guest house situated in Lisbon, 4.1 km from Commerce Square. It is set 4.4 km from Jeronimos Monastery and features full-day security. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

At the guest house, every unit comes with a desk. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with pancakes, fruits and juice are available.

St. George's Castle is 4.6 km from the guest house, while Rossio is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 11 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lisbon Colours Bairro Alto Apartments
Description:
Lisbon Colours offers modern apartments in Lisbon’s lively Bairro Alto district. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. The property recently added brand new apartments to its offer. Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartments include a living room with a flat-screen TV and a dining area. Some open onto a terrace or a balcony with garden or river views. Large windows, soft colours, and wooden floors are part of the bright décor.

Several restaurants, cafés, and shops are within walking distance of Lisbon Colours. Alfaia Restaurant & Wine Bar offers typical Portuguese cuisine and wines and it is a few steps away.

Bairro Alto is famous for its nightlife, cultural events, alternative fashion shops, city viewpoints, bars, cafes and restaurants.

Rossio Train and Metro Station, with links to Sintra, Belém, Estoril and Cascais is a 10-minute walk away. Lisbon International Airport can be reached in 10-15 minutes by car or metro.

Name: Hotel Britania Art Deco - Lisbon Heritage Collection - Avenida
Description:
Located on a quiet street alongside Avenida da Liberdade, this 4-star hotel is stylized in genuine art déco and offers warmly decorated rooms with cork floors and free WiFi. Its prime location places it at just 300 metres from Avenida Metro Station, which connects with Rossio and Chiado within a short metro ride.

The elegant guest rooms of Britania have an art déco style and include double glazing, flat-screen TVs and CD/DVD players. They have private bathrooms with bathrobes, slippers and Molton Brown toiletries. The traditional building dates back to 1940 and was fully renovated in 2011.

Hotel Britania offers 24-hour room service as well as a convenient breakfast buffet, which is served until 12:00. Guests may also enjoy breakfast in their room, upon previous request. The hotel bar reminds guests of colonial times with its many paintings of Portugal's overseas empires.

The Botanical Garden is within close proximity, at just a 7-minute walk. The Britania Hotel is situated  7 km from Lisbon Airport, which is reachable via metro. Bairro Alto is 1.5 km away and is one the city's liveliest areas, with various shops, bars and popular eateries. The iconic São Jorge Castle is within 2.3 km.

Name: Vincci Alfama
Description:
Situated in Lisbon and with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte reachable within less than 1 km, Vincci Alfama features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and 700 metres from St. George's Castle.

At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options.

There is a tour desk and car rentals are available, while the business centre has an ATM machine.

Popular points of interest near Vincci Alfama include Commerce Square, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Graça
Description:
Offering quiet street views, Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Graça is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Rossio and 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is located 1.7 km from Commerce Square, 1 km from St. George's Castle and 7 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 500 metres away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Gare do Oriente is 8.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Graça, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Altis Suites Apartamentos Turísticos
Description:
The 4-star Altis Suites Apartamentos Turísticos in Lisbon’s shopping district offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is set 200 metres from the trendy shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade.

The spacious, air-conditioned apartments have a large living room, flat-screen cable TV, fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with hairdryer. Some have a private balcony. All units are modernly-equipped and include free WiFi access.

Room service is available and the Altis Grand Hotel next door offers 2 dining outlets, including the 12th floor Grill D. Fernando serving Portuguese cuisine. 3 separate bar areas are also on offer, one of which overlooking central Lisbon. Various local restaurants and eateries are available at a short 5-minute walk.

Other facilities at the Altis Grand Hotel are a business centre and hairdresser. The Altis Suites Apartamentos Turísticos ApartHotel provides a ticket service.

Chiado and Rossio are accessible within a short metro drive and are 2 of the city's most renowned historical areas. Lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and is Lisbon's most famed nightlife district. The iconic São Jorge Castle is 2.9 km from the Altis. The aparthotel is a 15-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Almaria - Da Corte Apartments | Chiado
Description:
Located on the site of an historic Lisbon building, Da Corte Apartments features luxurious accommodation, in a setting which blends antique decorative features and modern comforts. It is primely located, at a 6-minute walk from Chiado and a 5-minute walk from Cais do Sodré.

The building's reception area features a unique chandelier, while the various apartments each feature smaller, but also unique, decorative pieces. Each accommodation is named after a different member of Portugal's monarchy. All units have a dining area, kitchenette and a seating area with a TV. Each also features a private bathroom with free toiletries. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchenette of their accommodation. Alternatively, Lisbon's historic centre is filled with a wide range of popular restaurants and eateries, many of which are within a 5 to 10-minute walk from the property.

Trendy Bairro Alto's shops, bars and cafés are a 12-minute walk away, while the historic Rossio is within a 9-minute walk from Almaria - Da Corte Apartments | Chiado. Avenida da Liberdade, with its high-end shops and boutiques, is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.8 km from the property.

Name: Boemio FLH Hotels
Description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lisbon, Boemio FLH Hotels features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.1 km from St. George's Castle, 1.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 7.8 km from Luz Football Stadium. Jeronimos Monastery is 8.3 km from the hotel and Lisbon Oceanarium is 9 km away.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at Boemio FLH Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a seating area. All guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

With staff speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Calçada do Combro
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.1 km from Rossio, 1.8 km from St. George's Castle and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Calçada do Combro features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Commerce Square.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from Calçada do Combro, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: LeL Madalena GuestHouse
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 600 metres from St. George's Castle and 600 metres from Commerce Square, LeL Madalena GuestHouse offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 600 metres from Rossio and provides full-day security. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 700 metres away and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.3 km from the guest house.

Boho Guesthouse - Rooms & Apartments is located in Lisbon, just 280 metres from Cais do Sodré Train and Metro Stations. The Tagus riverside is 300 metres away while Chiado is within 400 metres.

All of the property's units come with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. The high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a short 5-minute walk away. Popular Chiado is within a 6-minute walk. At 1 km is Bairro Alto, one of the city's most renowned nightlife hotspots. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.6 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Located at the central Saldanha Square, Pátria Hotel offers rooms with air conditioning, just a 1-minute walk from the Saldanha Metro station. Lisbon's historic centre is a 10-minute metro ride away, featuring emblematic areas like Chiado, Rossio and Bairro Alto.

Situated in historic Lisbon, Eurostars Das Letras offers designer rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi access. The Botanic Gardens of Lisbon are 1 km away.

Ample and offering marble and timber furnishings, each themed room has a pillow menu and luxury bathroom amenities. Although Eurostars Das Letras is centrally located, rooms are quiet and some offer panoramic views of São Jorge castle.

Name: Residencial Horizonte
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, opposite the Parque Metro station, the Residencial Horizonte Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. St. George's Castle is 3.4 km away.

The rooms at Residencial Horizonte are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have a safety deposit box, a hairdryer, and a modern en suite bathroom.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a local and international buffet breakfast in Residencial Horizonte Hotel’s breakfast room. The bar offers refreshing drinks and light snacks.

Guests can benefit from Hotel Residencial Horizonte’s 24-hour reception. The hotel also offers laundry facilities and concierge and porter services.

The Horizonte Hotel is a short walk from Eduardo VII gardens and close to the central shopping districts of Lisbon. The Parque Metro station opposite the hotel provides access to the Benfica Stadium, the zoo, and Santa Apolonia.

Name: My Story Hotel Ouro
Description:
With a themed décor based on Portuguese tiles, the charming My Story Hotel Ouro occupies an 18th century building in the heart of the historic Baixa district of Lisbon. Its outdoor esplanade is on one of Lisbon's traditional pedestrian streets.

Featuring a golden headboard, all air-conditioned rooms have a private bathroom, a Smart TV, safe and free WiFi. They also have a minibar. Communicating rooms are available upon availability. Each room has an elegant décor and some feature views over the surrounding streets.

Featuring tasty dishes and a comprehensive cocktail list, the bar and restaurant at My Story Hotel Ouro is a great spot to enjoy traditional Portuguese cuisine or savour a drink. The central location of the hotel allows guests to easily explore the capital city. The reception is open 24-hours a day.

Tejo River is around 400 metres and offers the ideal setting to enjoy a drink while watching the sunset, in of Commerce Square's summer terraces. Santa Justa Lift is less than 5-minutes walking from the hotel.

Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is a few steps from My Story Hotel Ouro, providing access to most of the greater Lisbon area. The historic façade of the Rossio Train Station is within 5 minutes’ walking. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km away and is accessible via metro.

Description:

Featuring a sophisticated decoration, wooden floors and in 3 of them balcony overlooking a garden or the National Pantheon, these apartments include 2 or 1 bedrooms each, a twin and a double. All the apartments have a private bathroom and a spacious living room with a flat-screen TV.

Guests staying at the Lisbon Unique Apartments can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen available. There is a dining area available in 2 of them. The shopping areas of Chiado and Rua Augusta are 2 km away and the scenic São Jorge Castle is 1 km away. The lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Portugal Boutique Hotel
Description:
Offering paid private parking (subject to availability), the 4-star Hotel Portugal features a 24-hour reception and a central location in Lisbon, 200 metres from Rossio Square. It has a bar on site and 24-hour room service.

With a large mirror with a built-in interactive TV, each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is carefully decorated and includes a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers. Free WiFi is available. Extra beds are available upon request, in the Deluxe rooms.

Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast  in the breakfast room or enjoy their breakfast in the privacy of their room, upon request. Varanda Lisboa Restaurant is located next door and features a shared passage way. It serves traditional Portuguese meals, with a panoramic city view. The newly-opened Adega Premium Winehouse Bar & Shop has an extensive wine list, as well as a décor inspired by traditional wine cellars. the Adega is ideal for lovers of tasty cheeses, local chorizos and Portuguese snacks.

Lively Bairro Alto's many bars and eateries are within a 10-minute walk. Chiado is an iconic Lisbon area, filled with shops and cafés, at a10-minute walking distance. Lisbon's Portela International Airport is 6.5 km from Portugal Boutique Hotel.

Name: York House Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Housed in a converted Carmelite Convent, this hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Lisbon's city centre. It combines chic, contemporary furnishings with traditional, 17th-century architecture. When weather is nice, the picturesque garden is also available for a refreshing drink.

York House provides an airport shuttle and a car-rental service at an extra charge. The reception is available 24 hours, and the popular shopping area of Amoreiras is 2 km from the hotel.

Name: Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel
Description:
Located 80 metres from Avenida da Liberdade, the 4-star Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is 300 meters from Marquês de Pombal Square. This certified eco-hotel has a prime location in Lisbon and features Spa & Wellness area, as well as a gluten-free menu in its Mediterranean-style restaurant.

The luxurious rooms of the Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel are decorated according to the principles of Feng Shui. Flat-screen TVs, free WiFi and Nespresso machines are standard in all of the stylish guest rooms.

A temple-like atmosphere can be enjoyed at the spa, which includes wet and dry saunas, a soothing hot tub and 6 treatment rooms. For an intense workout, the Hotel also features a gym.

Organic, locally sourced ingredients are blended in the Mediterranean dishes of its stylish restaurant. Vegan, vegetarian and lactose-free dishes are included in its extensive menu. The Mediterranean Brasserie offers a range of activities, including show-cooking, workshops and wine tasting. A cosy fireplace, retro décor and a comprehensive cocktail menu are available at the Urban Bar.

The Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and a 15-minutes' walk from historic Rossio. Chiado is 2 km away and features a multitude of traditional shops and typical cafés. The lively bars and eateries of Bairro Alto are within a 20-minute walk. The Hotel is 9.3 km from Lisbon International Airport, which is accessible via metro.

Name: Áurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company
Description:
Áurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company is a unique 5-star property situated on the banks of the Tagus River, in a historic building in Lisbon's iconic Alfama quarter. The hotel features a permanent archaeological exhibition, as well as modern facilities, like an indoor pool, restaurant, massage room and Turkish bath.

The décor features references to the cultural legacy of the hotel's building. The air-conditioned rooms all come with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and a work desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A daily breakfast buffet is available at the property. The in house restaurant features a variety of traditional Portuguese and International dishes. Guests can also find a wide range of restaurants and eateries within a short 5-minute walk. Alfama is famed for its Fado Houses, which pair traditional Fado concerts with tasty Portuguese tapas.

A fitness centre is also featured at the property, along with a 24-hour front desk and various meeting rooms.

The iconic São Jorge Castle is a 15-minute uphill walk. Commerce Square is just 500 metres away, while Rossio is a 16-minute walk from Áurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 8.4 km from the property.

Name: The Lisbonaire Apartments
Description:
Located in a quiet street in the heart of downtown Lisbon, a short stroll from Chiado, Bairro Alto and the Castle, it’s the ideal starting point to visit Lisbon, near the most important monuments and sights, with numerous shops, restaurants, bars and transportation.

The distinctive 1960s building was fully rebuilt, and each apartment has artwork by Portuguese designers, inspired by the visual and typographic heritage of downtown Lisbon, making the apartments unique and special.

The Lisbonaire boasts 19 studios and one bedroom apartments, with fully equipped kitchens, furnished and decorated, subject to the idea of 100% Portuguese.

Every apartment has all the must-have utilities and also high speed Wi-Fi, cable TV, Google Home assistants and USB outlets.

EQUIPMENT: Fully equipped kitchen | Full size fridge and freezer | Microwave | Oven | Cooker | Dishwasher | Washing machine | Dryer (in common area) | Toaster | Kettle | Iron and ironing board | Hair dryer | Full length mirror | Safe

COMFORT: Air conditioning | King size beds (180x200cm) or twin beds | Cotton sheets and towels | Orthopedic matresses | Room toiletries | Detergents | Basic consumables

Additionally, our guests can also use the rooftop terrace, gym, and lounge room with library, pool table and kids zone.

ACCESS: Guests have 24-hour access to The Lisbonaire Apartments with a "no key" system with their own access code.

TRANSPORTATION: The Restauradores Subway Station is at 200 meters (Blue line). The Rossio Train Station is 250 meters away. Portela Airport is 8 km from the property.

CHECK IN - CHECK OUT: Check in is at 3PM and check out at 12PM (midday). For early check ins or late check outs, the guests have easy access to a storage room.

SERVICES: Parking (extra cost) | Pet Pack (extra cost) | Baby Bundle | Frontdesk 8AM - 0AM | Daily housekeeping | Extra Bed (in some apartments with extra cost) | Breakfast Delivery (arranged in advance with our partner and with extra cost)

GROUP POLICY: Any reservation of 2 or more apartments will be considered a group with different terms and conditions. Groups reservations can only be made or approved through our reservations team, and The Lisbonaire Apartments reserves the right to cancel it otherwise. The property is not appropriate to accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Name: Vistas de Lisboa Hostel
Description:
With free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, modern Vistas de Lisboa Hostel offers a comfortable accommodation. In central Lisbon, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Figueira Square and Rossio Metro Station.

Most of the bright dormitories and rooms have a small balcony with views of Lisbon. Lockers are available for each guest, and bathrooms are shared.

There is a supermarket and lots of restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk.

The walk up the hill to São Jorge Castle takes around 20 minutes and it can also be accessed by a tram that stops a 5-minute walk from Hostel Vistas de Lisboa. Within 2 minutes’ walk there are bus stops, and a tram to Belém, home to a tower surrounded by the Tagus River.

Located 200 metres away is Santa Justa Lift and 100 metres further are the ruins of the Carmo Convent. Rossio Train Station is 500 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela
Description:
Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela is set in the Estrela district of Lisbon, 3.6 km from Rossio, 3.7 km from St. George's Castle and 3.7 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. It is located 3.2 km from Commerce Square and offers a lift. The apartment also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4.8 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela.

Name: Corinthia Lisbon
Description:
The 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon is 150 metres from the Lisbon Zoo Metro Station and a 5-minute metro ride from trendy Avenida da Liberdade. A recent recipient of environmental awards, it features 2 restaurants and the largest spa area in Lisbon.

All of the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon have been tastefully decorated and fitted with cable TVs, as well as free WiFi. Each has a private bathroom with free luxury toiletries.

The hotel's Soul Garden - Outdoor Restaurant and Cocktail Bar has a colourful and tranquil ambiance, serving light meals, snacks, refreshing drinks and cocktails. The hotel's main restaurant, is the Erva Restaurant and Bar, which was recently fully renovated. The restaurant is inspired by Lisbon and Portuguese gastronomy, has a relaxed atmosphere and even includes a grill bar area, for live cooking.

Guests can relax at the hotel’s large, 3000 m2 luxury spa. It offers massage therapies and beauty treatments, such as mesotherapy and facial treatments as well as an aqua circuit with swimming pools, hot tubs and a fully equipped gym.

The ample Sky Lounge is located on the 24th floor and features a 360º view over the city. Here, guests may enjoy using the business centre with free WiFi, reading daily newspapers or magazines, tasting complimentary canapés, as well as soft drinks, coffee and tea throughout the day.

The unit is a 15-minute Metro ride from the city’s historical downtown, featuring popular Chiado and Rossio. Lively Bairro Alto’s bars are also at a 15-minute Metro ride. The iconic São Jorge Castle is within 7.5 km. Lisbon’s premier shopping area, Amoreiras is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Corinthia Hotel Lisbon.

Name: Imperador Hotel
Description:
Imperador Hotel is located 2 minutes’ walk from Praça Duque de Saldanha Square with access to Lisbon’s metro. It offers a room service and free WiFi in its business centre.

All rooms at the Imperador Hotel are air conditioned and fitted with a private bathroom with bathtub and bidet. Each room also comes with cable TV and a minibar with refreshing beverages.

Imperador Hotel can arrange car rentals for guests at its 24-hour front desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided.

Lisbon Zoo is a 10-minute drive from Imperador Hotel and Parque Eduardo VII city park is a 20-minute walk away. Lisbon centre, Rossio, can be reached with 6 metro stops.

Name: Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse
Description:
Located in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse is 30 meters from Santa Justa Lift, 200 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 200 metres from Rossio.
Built in 18th century, the property is within 400 metres of Chiado and 1.1 km of Bairro Alto. The property is 1.3 km from Liberty Avenue and 2.4 km from Amoreiras.

From the balconies in the living room and in some units is possible to see the Castle and Carmo Ruins.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a shared bathroom with free toiletries, while selected rooms include a balcony.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6 km from Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Alojamento Local Private Accommodation
Description:
Situated 250 metres from the Intendente Metro Station, this Alojamento is set on a private building and features 3 single rooms with balconies, 11 double bed bedrooms, and 6 triple rooms, one with 3 single beds and five with one double bed and a single bed.

All rooms at Alojamento Local Private Accommodation have wooden floors, furnishings, and a work desk. The rooms have a shared bathroom that is located in the hallway.

Guests can use Alojamento Local Private Accommodation’s shared kitchen to prepare their own meals. The kitchen comes equipped with an electric kettle, microwave, and refrigerator; stove cooking is not allowed.

The reception time starts at 2:00 p.m. and ends at 22:30 p.m. Reception staff provide guests with free city maps and guides.

Public parking is available on the street near the property, which is paid for from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. and free during the night and weekends, and the lively Avenida da Liberdade is a 15-minute walk away. Lisbon’s Portela Airport is 10 kilometres away from the property.

Name: Hotel A.S. Lisboa
Description:
This hotel is situated next to Parque da Fonte Luminosa, 50 metres from Alameda Metro Station. The warmly decorated rooms include satellite TV, and some offer Tagus River views.

The extensive buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 to 10:30 and includes several rolls and pastries, along with cold cuts, cheeses and fresh fruit. Guests of Hotel A.S. Lisboa are greeted with a welcome tea, and a bar is available to enjoy an after-dinner drink.

Each room at A.S. Lisboa includes a minibar, a safety deposit box and a modern bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer. Rooms on higher floors offer panoramic views over Lisbon.

A.S. Lisboa Hotel is 3 km away from St. George's Castle and a 6-stop ride on the metro to both the Baixa and the Park of Nations. Lisbon Portela Airport is less than 5 km away.

Name: Mama Shelter Lisboa
Description:
Attractively set in Lisbon, Mama Shelter Lisboa features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The property is allergy-free and is situated 1.6 km from Rossio.

The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the hotel rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

Guests at Mama Shelter Lisboa can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak German, English, French and Portuguese.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 2.5 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Dear Lisbon - Gallery House
Description:
Located at 200 metres from Bairro Alto, Dear Lisbon - Gallery House is located in Lisbon, at 700 metres from Estrela Garden. The property is just 150 metres from the Portuguese Parliament and a 10-minute walk from both Santos Train Station and the riverside.

Featuring free WiFi access throughout the property, this bed and breakfast features rooms equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while certain rooms include city views. All units at Dear Lisbon - Gallery House have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The surrounding area provides a variety of alternatives for guests to taste the rich Portuguese cuisine. Many cafés and eateries are within a short 5-minute walk.

Speaking English, French and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. The scenic São Pedro de Alcântara Belvedere is at 1 km.

At 1.2 km is trendy Cais do Sodré, one of the city's most hip nightlife areas. Liberty Avenue is at a 20-minute walk and is filled with high-end shops and boutiques. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the bed and breakfast.

Name: Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade
Description:
Located on Lisbon’s main avenue, Avenida da Liberdade, this luxurious hotel is right in front of the Avenida Metro stop. It has a modern gym, a restaurant and a library. Some of the rooms have balconies and views to the posh avenue.

The rooms and junior suites at the 5-star Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade have modern décor and include an LCD TV, a minibar and fresh flowers. Each bathroom has luxurious amenities and a shower.

The Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade serves a rich breakfast in the mornings. Add our Matiz restaurant and bar, where heritage meets modernity, and guests can enjoy a contemporary take on an authentic Portuguese.

The Sofitel Lisbon also offers a multilingual staff, as well as babysitting services and laundry services.

Rossio and Chiado, two of the historical downtown's most famous areas are both at a short 5-minute drive or 10-minute walking distance. The hotel is just 1 km from Sao Roque Church and 2.5 km from Sao Jorge Castle.

Name: Vincci Baixa
Description:
Located in Baixa’s centre, this 4-star hotel is 150 metres from Praça do Comércio’s bus, tram and metro links. It has an elegant restaurant and a bar. The hotel's comfortable bedrooms were fully renovated in April of 2017.

The stylish rooms at the Vincci Baixa include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also have a minibar, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with amenities. Free WiFi is available.

The Comércio 36 Restaurant serves a rich breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients, including meals for celiacs. The lounge bar serves refreshing drinks and light snacks. Room service is also available.

Convenient facilities at the Vincci include laundry services and a tour desk where guests can arrange to visit local attractions.

The Baixa is surrounded by trendy bars, shops and restaurants. It is just a 5-minute walk from the historic Sé Catedral. Portela Airport is 7 km away.
