Name: CASA AMORA Studio Apartments
Description:
Situated in Travessa das Amoreiras in Lisbon, right next to Amoreiras Garden, Casa Amora Studios Self-Catering Apartments is a typical building of Lisbon’s early 20th century.

Casa Amora Studios offers 4 Self-Catering Apartments, all with air-conditioned and free Wi-Fi. Each Studio pays homage to one of the great figures of Portuguese art.

Guests can start their day exploring the surrounding area, where’s also many restaurants and bars.

CASA AMORA Studio Apartments is located in one of the nicest and central districts of Lisbon, Praça das Amoreiras.

In this neighborhood, where the 18th century Aqueduct (that survived the great Lisbon earthquake of 1755) reaches and end, Casa Amora is neighbour to Water Museum (Museu da Mae de Agua) and the Vieira da Silva / Arpad Szenes museum.

Residents and visitors have easy and direct access to the neighborhoods of antique shops (Rua de Sao Bento and Rua da Escola Politecnica), historic districts (Bairro Alto and Chiado), Avenida da Liberdade and its fashion shops as well as the shopping center Amoreiras, all at walking distance.

Name: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show
Description:
Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

Every day, a videomapping show is performed in the interior garden of the hotel. Guests can enjoy this immersive experience of light and colour.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show every room includes bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Rossio. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show.

Name: Belem Aloja
Description:
Located in Lisbon, 6.3 km from Commerce Square and 6.8 km from Rossio, Belem Aloja offers air conditioning. The property has river and garden views, and is 6.9 km from St. George's Castle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Jeronimos Monastery is 1.7 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like cycling.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 6.9 km from Belem Aloja, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 8 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: DoBairro suites at Bairro Alto
Description:
Do Bairro Suites at Bairro Alto is a recently renovated building at the heart of Bairro Alto. Chiado is 300 metres from the property.

All apartments feature a seating and dining area. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. All include a kitchenette, with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower in each unit. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Name: The ART INN Lisbon
Description:
The modern and elegant décor of The ART INN Lisbon is complemented by its prime location in the Rossio, one of Lisbon’s most historical areas and is full of shops, boutiques and typical cafés. The Rossio Metro Station connects with most of the Lisbon area and is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a private bathroom, desk, safe, free WiFi, Nespresso machine, tea-and-coffee making facilities, a wardrobe and a flat-screen cable TV. Some rooms also feature a balcony.

The Art INN offers a Rooftop Restaurant and Bar operational every day from 5:30pm to 10:30pm.

At The ART INN Lisbon guests can enjoy a continental breakfast. A number of local restaurants are available in the vicinity of the property, most serving traditional Portuguese meals. The wine bar at the lobby offers the opportunity of a late night drink.

Bairro Alto is a 15-minute walk away and the iconic São Jorge Castle is a 13-minute walk. A 5-minute drive from The ART INN Lisbon is the historical Alfama neighbourhood, which features plenty of establishments where guests can watch a Fado concert, while enjoying a glass of quality Portuguese wine and some tapas.

Lisbon International Airport is a 14-minute drive away from The ART INN Lisbon.

Description:
Primely located in central Lisbon, InterContinental Lisbon is a luxury 5-star hotel overlooking the famous Eduardo VII Park. It is just 500 metres from Marquês de Pombal Square and 700 metres from trendy Avenida da Liberdade's boutiques.

InterContinental Lisbon has chic, spacious guestrooms. Many of the rooms have panoramic views overlooking the park's green areas. All rooms have flat-screen TVs and access to satellite channels. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel’s Akla Restaurant is open daily and serves a wide range of international dishes alongside a wide selection of Portuguese specialties. The UpTown Bar is the perfect spot to enjoy a drink in a relaxing, homely environment. Local restaurants are available within a short walking distance, many serving typical Portuguese dishes.

The nearby Marques de Pombal Metro Station connects with most of the city's emblematic areas. Lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and features a variety of popular bars, restaurants and cafés. Rossio and Chiado, two of the historical downtown's most famous areas are both at a short 5-minute drive. The emblematic São Jorge Castle is 4 km from the hotel. Portela International Airport is 7.4 km from the InterContinental Lisbon.

Featuring sea views, this apartment also includes a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 7.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Alfama Loft Studio Loft Apartment w/ River View - by LU Holidays, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: My Story Hotel Figueira
Description:
Set in Lisbon and with Rossio reachable within 300 metres, My Story Hotel Figueira offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. My Story Hotel Figueira provides some units with city views, and all rooms have a coffee machine. All units feature a desk.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near My Story Hotel Figueira include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Description:
Líbere Lisbon Príncipe Real features accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 800 metres from Rossio and less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

At the apartment complex, each unit has a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Units are equipped with air conditioning, and some units at the apartment complex have a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with a seating area.

A selection of options including local specialities, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Commerce Square is 1.5 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 1.9 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Corujinha Hostel
Description:
Set within 3 km of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Corujinha Hostel features rooms in Lisbon. The property is around 3 km from Liberty Avenue and 3.4 km from Amoreiras. The accommodation provides free WiFi.

Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. All guest rooms will provide guests with a toaster.

Name: EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel
Description:
BE PART OF THE EVOLUTION LISBOA TRIBE!

Located at only 10 minutes from the International Lisbon Airport, facing one of the most known landmarks of Lisbon, Duque de Saldanha Square, you will find the EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel. Part of the generation of trendy Urban Hybrid Hotels, the perfect combination of the facilities of a Hotel with a Co-working place and an entertaining After-work life.
EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel is for a new wave of mobile open-minded Business and Leisure Travelers and Visitors from the world and the local community, all with an unconventional, curious, tech-oriented, and fun spirit.

All our rooms combine above all originality and functionality as well as comfort, thoughtfully conceived and decorated, with a colorful fun vibe to inspire happiness and wellbeing.
A minimalist concept with purposeful, trendy design spaces, infused with a sense of freedom and easy-going that make our Guests feel in control at all times during their stays.

The experience starts in the open lobby floor, by picking up at the self-Check-in Kiosks your E-Key card access to your room, to the 24/7 Fitness, Pool, and Wellbeing facilities at the 9th top floor, including to the underground garage. Then continues with the all-day Grab & Go and food concepts, from breakfast to light lunch, snacks, or dinner at the easy-cool Lounge Bar & Restaurant, with indoor and outdoor terraces. For Guests and Visitors, the spacious and smart co-working floor at the hotel mezzanine offers the perfect work ambience with free WI-FI access.
After work or a day in town, EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel proposes entertaining after-work moments, with current soundtracks or live DJ’s catchy vibes - Is always time, by yourself, or between colleagues and friends, to mingle, socialize and relax, sipping signature cocktails or other delightful beverages, enhanced by a trendy groovy led lighting, from nightfall until the late evening.

Offering easy and right at the Hotel door access to transport facilities - Metro, bus, and taxi stations. Our Guests will be able to connect with most of the exciting cultural, historical city landmarks, the luxury shops, and boutiques of the main avenues, as well as the nightlife iconic spots.

EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel invites you in an original experience for your total cool lifestyle.

Name: Hotel Real Palacio
Description:
The 5-star Hotel Real Palacio in Lisbon is close to Parque Eduardo VII and less than 5 minutes' walking from El Corte Ingles shopping centre. Luxury amenities include a sauna and hot tub.

The bright, spacious rooms at Hotel Real Palacio have free WiFi and satellite TV. They are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a minibar. Guests receive free bathroom amenities throughout their stay.

The contemporary Real Restaurant serves a rich breakfast buffet. Regional specialities can be sampled in the elegant, à la carte restaurant and bar, Real Cozinha.

A gym is available at the on-site health club. Following a workout, guests can unwind at the facilities for a relaxing experience: sauna, jacuzzi and steam room.

The friendly staff at Real Palácio's front desk can organise a car rental service.

Dinner or lunch can be enjoyed at the Real Cozinha Restaurante-Bar which specialises in traditional Portuguese food, which also features on selected days an Executive Lunch menu or a Family Brunch with children activities.

For sports lovers, the Real Sports Bar is the unmissable spot in Lisbon with its cosy and welcoming atmosphere to cheer your favourite team in good company with a range of international and craft beers to choose from, alongside sangrias and hearty food such as hamburguers, veal steak and savoury snacks ideal for sharing.

Name: Dare Lisbon House
Description:
Located in Lisbon's historic centre, Dare Lisbon House is situated at a short walk from Chiado and at a 5-minute walk from the Santa Justa Lift. It is within a renovated 18th century building, which still features many of its original features.

With an elegant décor and an exclusive design, all units at the property were decorated in collaboration with local artists. All units includes free WiFi, air conditioning, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a free toiletries and shower.

The property provides guests with the necessary ingredients to prepare their own breakfast, including daily fresh items. A 24-hour front desk and a concierge service are available at the apartment.

Avenida da Liberdade is 300 metres from Dare Lisbon House. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the property.

Name: 138 Liberdade Hotel
Description:
The 5-star 138 Liberdade Hotel has a décor with contemporary art pieces, along with vintage details. The trendy property is centrally located in Lisbon's Liberdade Avenue, which is renowned for its prestigious boutiques and restaurants.

Each room or suite takes in plenty of natural light and features a white or black décor with Victorian-inspired details. Each has a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The modern bathroom has a glass-walled shower and free toiletries. The rooms and suites come with views over Liberdade Avenue or Lisbon's old town area. Free WiFi is provided.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, as well as lunch and dinner service. It features fine Portuguese and Spanish cuisine, paired with a selection of quality Iberian wines. This boutique-chic hotel also has an open deck, where guests may enjoy a refreshing cocktail from the bar while taking in the surroundings.

Chiado, the city's downtown area is a 15-minute walk and is filled with historical cafés and shops. Bairro Alto is Lisbon's main night life area, just a 13-minute walk away. Popular São Jorge's Castle is a 20-minute walk, while Alfama is a 15-minute walk and is famed for being Lisbon's Fado district.

The nearest Metro Station is just 20 metres away from the hotel. 138 Liberdade Hotel is 7.6 km from Portela International Airport.

Name: SantoSweethome 1
Description:
Situated within 1.7 km of Commerce Square and 1.6 km of Rossio, SantoSweethome 1 features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like cycling.

St. George's Castle is 2.8 km from SantoSweethome 1, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 10 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade
Description:
Situated on Liberdade Avenue, amidst high-end shops and boutiques, the 4-star NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade offers a seasonal rooftop pool and lawned terrace, with scenic views over Lisbon and the Tagus River. The Avenida Metro Station is conveniently just in front of the hotel.

The NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade provides spacious rooms with a modern décor. Each room includes a Nespresso coffee machine, with 3 free daily capsules. All rooms and suites come with a pillow menu and are equipped with a work desk, minibar, free high-speed WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a professional hair dryer and a vanity mirror, as well as with free toiletries.

A daily buffet breakfast is served, which offers a wide range of fresh local products, as well as vegan and gluten-free options. Breakfast in the room is possible and there is also room service available. Rich local cuisine and a variety of drinks are served at the hotel’s Restaurant Do Teatro. Guests can enjoy light snacks and refreshments at the café on the ground floor.

The rooftop area features a bar, where guests can enjoy a refreshing drink, while enjoying panoramic views over historic Lisbon, the river and even São Jorge's Castle. There are also plenty of restaurants, pubs and shops surrounding the hotel. The hotel's lifts are panoramic, also providing city views. The hotel features meeting rooms, with a maximum capacity of 35 people, as well as a 24-hour fitness centre. One of the meeting rooms has castle views, as well as direct access to the rooftop area. A guest relations service is provided to all guests of the hotel.

NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade is located in the heart of Lisbon’s historical and commercial centre just a 12-minute walk from Bairro Alto and Chiado districts. It is 700 metres from Marques de Pombal Square, the Rossio Train Station plus the Santa Justa Lift and 20 minutes’ walk from São Jorge Castle. Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: Hotel DAH - Dom Afonso Henriques
Description:
Situated between Lisbon’s International Airport and the historical downtown, Hotel Dom Afonso Henriques is primely located in the Portuguese capital. The popular Chiado and Rossio are within a 10-minute drive.

The Hotel offers free WiFi and soundproofed rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Each room at the Hotel Dom Afonso Henriques is bright and elegantly furnished. All the air-conditioned rooms are heated and contain a free safety deposit box, as well as a telephone. The private bathrooms feature free toiletries.

The buffet breakfast is served in a modernly decorated room with a panoramic view of the city. Refreshing beverages, coffee and snacks are available at the 1st floor lounge. Guests wishing to discover the Portuguese gastronomy may do so in the many restaurants available in Lisbon's downtown area.

The reception desk is open 24/7 and the staff will be happy to provide you with any help you require. The hotel also features car and bicycle rental, as well as a tour desk offering advice on excursions. On-site private parking is available.

The Alameda metro station, connects directly with the city centre and is a 5-minute walk away. The Dom Afonso Henriques Hotel is 3 km away from St. George's Castle. Those wishing to try the city's nightlife may do so in lively Bairro Alto, just 6.5 km away. Avenida da Liberdade is 3.7 km away and is filled with high-end stores and boutiques.

The Hotel DAH - Dom Afonso Henriques is a 7-minute drive from Portela International Airport. An airport shuttle service is available, upon request and at an extra fee.

Name: Panoramic Living
Description:
Panoramic Living is located in Lisbon’s Parque das Nações. The apartments and studios are 1 km from the MEO Arena and 1.2 km from Gare do Oriente transport hub.

The elegant studios and apartments are air conditioned and have a seating area with sofas and a flat-screen cable TV. Studios have a kitchenette, while apartments come with a full kitchen. Each unit has a private bathroom, with bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

The Panoramic Living’s guests are welcome to cook up their own culinary creations in the full kitchen or kitchenette at their disposal, which also include a handy dishwasher. Alternatively, Parque das Nações features a variety of restaurants, eateries and bars, many within a short 5-minute walk.

Guests can walk along the long promenade of the Parque das Nações, observing the Tagus River while passing by landmarks like the Vasco da Gama Tower, the Lisbon Casino and the Lisbon Oceanarium. Rossio is a 20-minute drive, as is Chiado in Lisbon’s historic downtown. Portela International Airport is 3 km from the Panoramic Living.

Name: Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments
Description:
Located at just 170 metres from Figueira Square and 300 metres from Rossio, this property is set in Lisbon's historic downtown area. Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments is 550 metres from Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River.

Featuring free WiFi and city views, all of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, living area with flat-screen TV and a fully-equipped kitchenette. The studios and apartments are all elegantly decorated in blue and white, with wooden floors. Free toiletries from Real Saboaria are provided.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchenette, which also comes with a coffee machine. A wide range of restaurants, cafés and pastry shops is available within a short walk from the property.

Chiado is 600 metres from the property and features several traditional sights, like the iconic A Brasileira café. The Santa Justa Lift is 210 metres from the property and provides sweeping views over the city's rooftops. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.6 km from Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments.

Name: SANA Malhoa Hotel
Description:
With a privileged location, between the Business district and some of Lisbon’s most iconic landmarks, SANA Malhoa Hotel offers the perfect option to all Cosmopolitan Travelers, in Business or Leisure. The Praça de Espanha metro station, the El Cortes Inglês Shopping Centre and the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum are just 5-minute walk away.

All Rooms and Suites are decorated and designed in a modern style to ensure comfort and well-being, fitting complimentary Wi-Fi access amongst other features. Communicating rooms are available for families on request.

The new Mediterrâneo Restaurant with a tropical-colonial vibe and natural lighting serves a delightful breakfast buffet, lunch and dinner. An in-room dining experience is also available 24 hours. The stunning trendy Bar & covered Terrace with a natural hanging garden is the ideal space to work or simply relax, taking advantage of the snack menu, with classic and trendy cocktails

Before or after a busy day, Guests are invited to a blissful journey at the SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA – with 3 treatment rooms, relaxation room, sauna, steam room, jacuzzi and a fitness room fully equipped.

SANA Malhoa Hotel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Praça de Espanha Metro Station. It takes less than a 15-minute drive to Lisbon Airport.

Name: Lisbon Marriott Hotel
Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and a relaxing garden area, the large 4-star Lisbon Marriott Hotel offers elegant accommodation with city views. It is a 10-minute drive from Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport.

Each air-conditioned room has a décor alluding to Lisbon and its history. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, a desk, floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony with either garden or Lisbon views. Each of the rooms includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

An extensive breakfast buffet is provided each morning, with some gluten-free options. Breakfast can be enjoyed in the garden in the warmer months of the year. Marriott Lisbon’s Citrus Restaurant overlooks the palm garden and serves Portuguese and Mediterranean cuisine as well as a selection of local wines. The Tapas & Tiles bar serves light meals, snacks and drinks.

Guests can relax on a poolside sun lounger and enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar. Lisbon Marriott Hotel features a fitness centre, which overlooks the lush garden. A large, well-equipped meeting space is also available, as well as the Mediterranean Ballroom, with a classical décor which includes antique chandeliers. .

The Sete Rios‎ transports’ hub is at a 5-minute drive. Avenida da Liberdade, with its high-end shops and boutiques and is 3 km from Marriott Lisbon. Lisbon's historic downtown area is within 5.5 km and is reachable via metro.

Name: Spacious Tailor Made Bairro Alto
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.5 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio, Spacious Tailor Made Bairro Alto features accommodation with quiet street views and free WiFi. The property is set less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.9 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.8 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from St. George's Castle.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and inner courtyard views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 10 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: 5 Seconds to Your Heart
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.7 km from Rossio and 3.3 km from Commerce Square, 5 Seconds to Your Heart features city views and free WiFi. The property is set 3.9 km from St. George's Castle, 4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1 km from the city centre and 1.6 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Luz Football Stadium is 6.8 km from 5 Seconds to Your Heart, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 10 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel
Description:
Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.7 km from Commerce Square. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from St. George's Castle.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer river views. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 2 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.7 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre, Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. The property is situated 2.5 km from Commerce Square, 2.7 km from St. George's Castle and 6.7 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is 1.8 km from Rossio, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a city view. The units at Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 7.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare do Oriente is 7.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Avani Avenida Liberdade Lisbon Hotel
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the 4-star AVANI Avenida Liberdade offers comfortable rooms with a contemporary style. Featuring private parking on site, this hotel is 100 metres from the Avenida metro station and a 10-minute walk from Rossio and the Pombaline Downtown. Guests have free access to Tivoli Avenida Liberdade's Spa and outdoor pool.

Air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a coffee machine and a desk. Some rooms come with a balcony and a private bathroom with bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms include a free Handy mobile device.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning and guests may enjoy a varied menu at the on-site restaurant from the renowned chef Olivier Costa. Guests are welcome to visit the sky bar at the sister hotel Tivoli Avenida Liberdade, as well as its 2 restaurants, Seen Lisboa and Cervejaria Liberdade. The trendy Bairro Alto neighbourhood is 850 metres away and a variety of restaurants serving traditional Portuguese and international cuisine may be found within walking distance.

AVANI Avenida Liberdade is just a 10-minute walk from the D. Maria II National Theatre and the Recreios Coliseum. The picturesque Alfama neighbourhood is 2 km away and the iconic São Jorge Castle is 2.2 km away. The Rossio Train Station is 900 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Hotel Principe Real
Description:
Located in Lisbon’s historic centre, this Boutique Hotel offers free WiFi in all rooms. There is a lobby where guests can help themselves from a 24-hour honesty bar, while enjoying a selection of books.

All non-smoking rooms have a well-stocked minibar, cosy armchair in the seating area and a bath in the en suite bathroom. Most rooms have a private balcony and some boast panoramic city views.

The hotel's breakfast is served à la carte and includes eggs, fresh juices and cakes. The front desk can organise citywide excursions and river cruises.

Hotel Principe Real is 550 metres from Avenida metro station, right in Avenida da Liberdade shopping area. Bairro Alto’s trendy restaurants, bars and clubs are a 5-minute walk away, as well as São Pedro de Alcântara belvedere.

Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away, easily accessible via metro.

Name: Iberostar Selection Lisboa
Description:
The 5-star Iberostar Selection Lisboa is located steps from the Eduardo VII Park and the Marquês de Pombal Square, in the Lisbon centre. With a bar and restaurant, the property has an outdoor swimming pool and features a terrace with gardens.

With different types of rooms, guests are able to choose between rooms with views over the city or suites. Room service is available 24 hours a day, at an extra cost.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. The hotel offers a delicious and unique variety of gastronomic products that guests can try in the Restaurant Luz and in the Boalma Bar.

Iberostar Selection Lisboa has 7 meeting rooms, some of which can be converted into 2 or 3 event areas, with a capacity for up to 250 people. Services available at an extra fee include a laundry service, 24-hour reception and private parking.

At Iberostar's SPA Sensations, guests can enjoy the Heated indoor pool, sauna, sensory shower, Turkish bath and massage services at an extra cost. The gym is free.

The famous Avenida da Liberdade is a 5-minute walk from Iberostar Selection Lisboa. Bairro Alto is just 1.2 km from the hotel and the iconic São Jorge Castle is 3.5 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 10 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: Apartment Carmo
Description:
In a central area of Lisbon, set within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Apartment Carmo offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located 800 metres from Commerce Square and provides a lift. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

St. George's Castle is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: The 7 Hotel, Suites, Studios & Apartments
Description:
The 7 Hotel, Suites, Studios & Apartments is located at the heart of Lisbon’s historic downtown, at a 3-minute walk from both Rossio Square and Chiado. The hotel is just a 1-minute walk from the Baixa/Chiado Metro Station.

The hotel features comfortable renovated rooms and studios, each equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, including free toiletries. Most rooms also have views over the street and the city. Free WiFi is provided.

Breakfast service is available in the rooms, at an extra fee. Guests of the studios are welcome to prepare light meals in the kitchenette at their disposal. Enjoying them in the small dining area. Alternatively, various Lisbon restaurants are accessible at a short 2-minute walk.

Chiado is renowned as one of Lisbon’s most iconic commercial areas. Another vaunted commercial district is the posh Avenida da Liberdade, 750 metres from 7 Hotel. The iconic São Jorge Castle is a 13-minute walk away. Portela International Airport is 7.5 km from The 7 Hotel, Suites, Studios & Apartments.

Name: Pestana CR7 Lisboa
Description:
Pestana Hotels and world-renowned footballer Cristiano Ronaldo’s partnership resulted in the 4-star Pestana CR7 Lisboa, located in a traditional Lisbon building, which was fully renovated. Located in the historic centre, it is a 2-minute walk from Commerce Square.

Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel. Pestana CR7 has an Art Deco-style design and features double rooms with a modern bathroom, a large flat-screen TV, air conditioning, a minibar, a wardrobe and a safe.

The on-site CR7 CORNER Bar&Bistro has an innovative cocktail selection, which were prepared by expert mixologists and can be enjoyed with ambiance music. The restaurant portion has a selection of tasty Portuguese delicacies and tapas, all within a casual and welcoming ambiance. Breakfast is served each morning in the restaurant area.

The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to help out guests, including pertinent tips on the best spots to eat and visit in the vicinity. The CR7 CORNER bar is an ideal spot for guests to unwind at the end of the day and enjoy a drink or cocktail or their choosing.

The hotel’s prime location makes it a great base from which to explore Lisbon. Rossio Square is at a 4-minute walk, while Chiado is within a 6-minute walk from the property. Bairro Alto and its trendy bars and shops at a 10-minute walk. Avenida da Liberdade’s shops and boutiques are at a 13-minute walk. Lisbon Portela Airport is 9.1 km away from Pestana CR7 Lisboa and is reachable via metro.

Name: Kalathos Houses
Description:
Kalathos Houses offers accommodation within 1.6 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. The property features quiet street views and is 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and less than 1 km from Commerce Square. Outdoor seating allows guests to sit outside and enjoy the good weather.

The apartment offers a seating area with a TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and shower. A fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can make the most of yoga classes offered on-site.

Popular points of interest near Kalathos Houses include St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Ideally situated in Lisbon, Blue Liberdade Hotel features a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Blue Liberdade Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a balcony. Guest rooms have a safety deposit box.

Description:
Boasting a bar, Hotel Moon & Sun Lisboa is situated in the centre of Lisbon, 500 metres from Commerce Square. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. Name: Apartments Center Lisboa
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Rossio and 1.1 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre, Apartments Center Lisboa offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. The hotel features elegantly decorated rooms with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. Each of the stylish air-conditioned rooms has a flat-screen cable TV, a work desk and a minibar.

Each of Jerónimos Hotel’s rooms features modern furnishings and comes equipped with air conditioning and cable TV. Also available is a minibar, safe box and room service. Some rooms offer private terraces.

Belém Railway Station is 10 minutes’ walk from Hotel Jerónimos 8, offering direct train connection to Lisbon’s central Baixa district.

A bus and tram stop providing access to the city centre is only a 2-minute walk away. Belém Tower is 2 km away. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 14 km away.

Description:
The modern Vila Galé Ópera is next to Tejo River and the lively Docas area, filled with restaurants and bars. This 4-star hotel features an indoor pool and a health club, plus free WiFi.

Each room and suite is comfortably furnished and includes room service. The friendly staff is at hand 24 hours per day and happy to arrange day trips or special activities for your children.

Galé Ópera’s restaurant serves a rich breakfast buffet and both buffet and à la carte menu for lunch and dinner. Every meal is complemented with Alentejo wines.

The health club offers a varied menu of relaxing massage, beauty treatments and leisure facilities to guests for an extra fee. For entertainment, there is a snooker room and occasionally live music during the evenings.

Lisbon Convention Centre is 2 minutes’ walking from the hotel, and Carris Museum is less than 300 metres. The industrial-style and creative hub of Lx Factory is a 7-minute walk.

Vila Galé Ópera has a tram and a train station at the doorstep, and it is less than 10 minutes from Lisbon city centre by car.

Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the renovated Le Consulat is set in the Luís de Camões Square and is just a few minutes’ walk from the Chiado shopping area. Free WiFi is available.

The surrounding area offers a variety of restaurants serving Portuguese and international cuisine, and the trendy nightlife neighbourhood of Bairro Alto is just a few metres away.

The Baixa-Chiado Metro Station is a 1-minute walk and the Cais do Sodré Train Station, connecting guests to Estoril and Cascais, is 600 metres away. Lisbon International Airport is 9 km away, easily accessible via public transportation.

Name: Lisboa Pessoa Hotel
Description:
Inspired by the life and work of Fernando Pessoa, Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. The Hotel features a restaurant with panoramic views, a SPA (for guests aged 16 and over) and fitness centre, meeting facilities and a library. Free WiFi and paid private parking are available.

Lisboa Pessoa Hotel offers a variety of rooms, including interconnecting rooms, rooms with a terrace and stunning views of Lisbon. All rooms have air conditioning, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each bathroom includes free toiletries and a walk-in shower.

The reception is available 24 hours. The hotel has free Wi-Fi.

Restaurante Mensagem provides an intimate atmosphere with eight niches with a private window and 2 terraces with views of the Portuguese capital. The products are carefully selected by Chef Manuel Ferreira and the dishes are inspired by Portuguese tradition.

Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is 200 meters from Rossio and 300 meters from Dona Maria II National Theater. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Turim Restauradores Hotel offers comfortable and affordable rooms in a prime location in the heart of Lisbon, just a few minutes’ walk from Rossio Station.

All bedrooms at Turim Restauradores Hotel have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom.

Restauradores Square is a short walk from the hotel.

The Turim Restauradores Hotel's facilities include a lounge and TV room, where you can relax after a day of sightseeing. It is 1 km to the historic Tagus riverfront.

Turim Restauradores Hotel is 7 km from Lisbon Airport. An on-site car rental service is available.

Name: Amazing Downtown Family Apartment
Description:
Located 1 km from Rossio and less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre in the centre of Lisbon, Amazing Downtown Family Apartment provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation offers a balcony. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Hotel Florida
Description:
Hotel Florida is centrally located in Lisbon, a 2-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square and its Metro Station . The uniquely decorated hotel has a vintage cinema theme throughout its rooms and common areas.

Guests can stay in rooms dedicated to Marilyn Monroe, Alfred Hitchcock or movie classics such as Casablanca. Many of the hotel's areas are decorated with quotes. Each renovated room comes with a flat-screen TV and minibar.

The bright meal room features a piano and panoramic views of Marquês de Pombal Square. Next to the hotel is the Great American Disaster restaurant, a 50's themed diner. Here, guests can enjoy classic American dishes, for an extra fee.

After a workout in the fitness room, guests of Florida can enjoy a drink in the winter garden or walk down Liberdade Avenue, which has a wide range of shops, cafés and restaurants. The Eduardo VII Park is a 5-minute walk away. Bairro Alto is Lisbon's main bar area, just a 7-minute drive away. The Chiado and Rossio historical areas are both at a 5-minute drive. Lisbon International Airport is 7.2 km from Hotel Florida.

Name: Hotel MeraPrime Gold Lisboa
Description:
MeraPrime Gold is a design hotel set in Lisbon's historic downtown, at just a 3-minute walk from Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River. Featuring a restaurant, which is also a boutique café, the property is 200 metres from the Baixa/Chiado Metro Station.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, wardrobe as well as free WiFi, which is available throughout the property. With a private bathroom, some rooms at MeraPrime Gold also have a river view.

All of the food served at the property has a Halal Certification. A continental or à la carte breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The hotel's Allow - License to Snack café features sweets, savoury snacks and assorted delicacies, all within a a cosy atmosphere. The surrounding area features a multitude of cafés and eateries, where guests can taste traditional Portuguese meals and delicacies, like the well-known Pastel de Nata.

Cais do Sodré, a lively nightlife area, is at a 600-metre distance. The famed Bairro Alto is an 8-minute walk, while Chiado is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.8 km from MeraPrime Gold.

Name: Modern Lisbon Apartments by Soulplaces
Description:
Modern Lisbon Apartments by Soulplaces features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated less than 1 km from Rossio and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits is available for the continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Old Fence Studios - By Mayoral
Description:
Old Fence Studios is located in Lisbon's historic Alfama district. At 100 metres from the Tagus River, the property is 700 metres from Commerce Square and 550 metres from Terreiro do paço Metro Station.

All units have a flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. All units include a kitchen or kitchenette. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in every unit.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchen or kitchenette of their studio. Alternatively, a wide range of traditional restaurants is available in the Alfama area, many of which serving tasty Portuguese specialties.

The National Pantheon is a 10-minute walk, while The Fado Museum is within 250 metres. The iconic São Jorge Castle is a 12-minute walk from the property. Chiado is 1.8 km away, while Bairro Alto is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 8.7 km from the property.

Description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Lisbon, Stay Hotel Lisboa Centro Chiado provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also offer city views. The units include a wardrobe.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Stay Hotel Lisboa Centro Chiado include Commerce Square, Rossio and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: MYRIAD by SANA Hotels
Description:
Next to the Tagus River, by the tallest tower of Portugal - the emblematic Torre Vasco da Gama, the hotel MYRIAD by SANA with its imposing and majestic sail-shaped design. This luxury hotel, member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts, features contemporary design Rooms and Suites, all with unparalleled panoramic views over the river or Parque das Nações.

MYRIAD by SANA has an exceptional Michelin-starred restaurant at the top of the tower - FIFTY SECONDS, for incredible epicurean experiences; 1 lobby restaurant-bar with terrace – RIVER LOUNGE, with one of the most trendy, charming, and unique hotel terraces on the river, to enjoy throughout the day; on the 23rd upper floor 1 sublime SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA facing the river with 4 treatment rooms, indoor pool and fitness center.

On the Hotel mezzanine the flexible 3 LEÓNIDAS meeting rooms with natural light for Events and Board Meetings, one of which is almost suspended over the river with a 180-degree view, and 1 unmissable Congress and Events Center - MYRIAD CRISTAL CENTER, with 2 floors and an outdoor deck area –connected by an aerial glass bridge to the Hotel.

MYRIAD by SANA has a privileged location, close to the entrance and exit routes, with excellent access points and transport facilities. Just 10 minutes from Lisbon International Airport by car, with train and metro stations close to the hotel. Guests can request a private VIP transfer service, upon request, prior to arrival or departure.

The Hotel surroundings combine several incredible spaces and a wide variety of shops, restaurants, and bars, all located along a stunning 5 km stretch of the Tagus riverfront.

Name: Tivoli Avenida Liberdade Lisboa – A Leading Hotel of the World
Description:
Housed in a 1930s building on Avenida da Liberdade, this 5-star luxury hotel boasts a rooftop bar with panoramic Lisbon views. It offers an outdoor round pool and 2 restaurants.

The Tivoli Avenida Liberdade’s pool area includes a spacious sun terrace framed by a green garden. Guests can enjoy a massage at the Anantara Spa.

The top-floor restaurant offers international cuisine, a wine list with over 300 selections, and panoramic views. The restaurant Cervejaria Liberdade features a menu with fish and seafood specialities from the coast of Portugal as well as typical meat snacks and pastries.

The carefully appointed rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and a seating area with velvet seats. Some rooms overlook the courtyard or Avenida da Liberdade.

Avenida Metro Station is 150 metres away. Guests can reach the Baixa-Chiado station with a 2-stop ride on the Blue Metro Line.

Name: SANA Metropolitan Hotel
Description:
SANA Metropolitan Hotel is located near Praça de Espanha and only 5 minutes’ drive from Marquês de Pombal Square. It features rooms with seating areas, bathrooms and flat-screen TVs.

Name: Hotel Santa Justa
Description:
The 4-star Santa Justa Hotel offers a central location in Lisbon, together with luxury rooms. Made up of 2 buildings interconnected by an exterior passage, the hotel is located in a pedestrian street 200 metres from Santa Justa Lift and features a 24-hour reception.

Offering views of the nearby landmarks, the large rooms at Santa Justa are modern in style. They feature a Nespresso coffee machine, mini-bar and a 101 cm LED SmartTV. All rooms have a private bathroom with Amenities and most include a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available in all Hotel areas.

Guests can enjoy the daily breakfast buffet, lunch, tea break and dinner at the Elevador Restaurant. Later, guests can head to the bar to enjoy a cocktail. Room service is available from 07:00 to 23:00. Guests can also enjoy live music nights, with Fado every Tuesday and Thrusday and Jazz every Saturday, from 8pm to 10 pm.

Staff at the reception can help guests making restaurant reservations, day trips, car rentals, babysitting services, and many other services. The hotel also provides laundry and dry cleaning services. An airport shuttle is available upon previous request and extra charges.

Augusta Street, filled with shopping and dining opportunities, is a few steps away from Hotel Santa Justa. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away and Rossio Train Station is less than a 5-minute walk.

Description:

Name: SANA Rex Hotel
Description:
Overlooking the Eduardo VII Park in central Lisbon, this classic 3-star Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square, and 15 min from Lisbon Airport. With easy access to transport facilities such as the Metro, Buses and Taxis. Guests can explore, among other options, the historic and cultural landmarks of the city center and the high-end shops on the famous Avenida da Liberdade and at El Corte Ingles shopping center, as well as the trendy nightlife spaces.

SANA Rex Hotel features Rooms, Family Rooms and Suites, and most of them have clear views over Eduardo VII Park and city of Lisbon and some views extend to the Tagus River.

Proposing to the Guests, 2 social spaces, the dining room where the buffet breakfast is served, and the Lobby Bar Lounge, where light meals, snacks, drinks & cocktails can be enjoyed, or simply a coffee. A place to stay all day to socialize, meet or, if the Guests wish, work with their laptop (free WIFI).
SANA Rex Hotel invites all Guests and Visitors, to discover at the Hotel entrance, an authentic and emblematic work of art created by the award-winning Portuguese sculptor, university lecturer and poet, Lagoa Henriques. A figurative bronze sculpture of two hard women fish seller workers, called “Varinas.”

Guest services such as 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and room service are available. A shuttle service can be requested, prior arrival or departure, with an extra fee.

Name: Hotel Nacional

Name: Chiado Camões Apartments | Lisbon Best Apartments
Description:
Chiado Camões Best Apartments enjoy a prime location in Lisbon, within Chiado and at the entrance of the lively Bairro Alto area. The Baixa/Chiado metro stop is at a 3-minute walk and the property has a wide range of popular eateries, shops and cafés at a short 2-minute walk.

The elegant, soundproof apartments come with views over the city and have an open plan area, which includes the living area, kitchenette and a dining area. There is a flat-screen TV, washing machine and air conditioning. Each unit features a marble bathroom, with free toiletries. A free mobile hotspot device is provided.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchenette at their disposal, which also has a dishwasher and a coffe machine. Alternatively, a variety of options are available in the vicinity for guests to try out the famed Portuguese cuisine. The nearby Bairro Alto is also a renowned nightlife hotspot.

At just a 3-minute walk is the A Brasileira café, a renowned Lisbon site, where famous artists and personalities used stop by. Historic Rossio is a 7-minute walk, and has a number of pastry shops and restaurants. At a 10-minute walk is Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 10.6 km from the property and is reachable via metro.

Name: Hotel da Baixa
Description:
With a colourful and classic façade, as well as a modern interior décor, the 4-star Hotel da Baixa enjoys a prime location in Lisbon's historic downtown area. Featuring a restaurant and a bar, it just 200 metres from Rossio Square a short walk from the iconic Santa Justa Lift.

The property features free WiFi throughout and has accommodation in elegant double, twin and family rooms. All units come with a 4K TV with internet access, Nespresso coffee machine and Bluetooth sound system. All accommodation comes with a private bathroom, including free Codage toiletries.

The daily buffet breakfast is served at the restaurant area and offers vegetarian and gluten-free options. The restaurant has a traditional atmosphere and specializes in international dishes as well as in tasty Portuguese dishes. The surrounding area features a wide range of restaurants, bakeries and cafés for guests to choose from, many within a 5-minute walk.

The property is 600 metres from Chiado and 350 metres from the Baixa/Chiado metro Station. The trendy and lively Bairro Alto is a 10-minute walk away and has various bars, cafés and shops. At a 9-minute walk is Liberty Avenue, which features many high-end shops and boutiques. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.6 km from Hotel da Baixa.

Name: EPIC SANA Marquês Hotel
Description:
Situated between the lush Parque Eduardo VII and the iconic Marquês de Pombal Square, the luxurious EPIC SANA MARQUÊS - member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts offers free WiFi, a fitness centre, concierge service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy fantastic views of downtown Lisbon and the Tagus River from the panoramic heated pool, open seasonally, at the top of the building.

This 5-star property offers spacious and elegantly designed suites and rooms that have private bathrooms with a bathtub and shower. Suites include a living room with a workstation. Facilities include LCD TV with cable channels, minibar, and luxury and well-being amenities.

Breakfast is served in the room or at The Garden buffet restaurant. Located on the 12th floor, the KOJI Bar and Restaurant overlooks the city and serves Japanese cuisine with a refined selection of drinks. With an open kitchen, antipasti bar and ice cream parlour, the Allora Restaurant presents dishes made with products from some of the best Italian regions.

The hotel offers its own wellness center concept - SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA, in association with the international brands, Natura Bissé and Aromatherapy Associates. With 700 m2, featuring 3 private treatment rooms, a double spa suite with its own jacuzzi and a wet area with sauna, vitality pool and turkish bath. It also has a Fitness Center with PT programs.

EPIC SANA MARQUÊS also features a Congress Center with 18 rooms, including a hall for events. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from the airport and within walking distance of the historic area of the city and important cultural and business centers. Its central location allows to quickly travel to any part of the city. Metro and bus stations are just around the corner.

Name: 1908 Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the 4-star 1908 Lisboa Hotel is housed in a completely renovated 1908 award-winning building by architect Adães Bermudes. Set in the corner of the Almirante Reis Avenue and Intendente Square, this hotel includes an ever evolving art gallery, a restaurant and a bar.

Featuring an art nouveau décor and unique contemporary pieces by Portuguese artists invited to reinterpret the building to the present day, 1908 Lisboa Hotel provides free WiFi throughout. Rooms offer French balconies with views of the square or the avenue. Private bathrooms come with a shower, free Castelbel™ toiletries, slippers and robes.

Breakfast is included in the rate and served at the Infame Restaurant which offers a Portuguese-base kitchen with multicultural influences. Guests are welcome to relax at the hotel’s bar which features unique pieces and a welcoming ambience. The Intendente neighbourhood offers a variety of cafés, restaurants and bars with live music.

1908 Lisboa Hotel’s staff will gladly share tips to visit the city and alternatives to what is available in most tourist guides. The Intendente Metro Station is 2-minute walk away and Lisbon International Airport is 5 km away.

Name: As Janelas Verdes Inn - Lisbon Heritage Collection - Riverside
Description:
Situated next to Lisbon's Ancient Art Museum and featuring a classic Portuguese décor, this boutique hotel features a rooftop library with a terrace and views of Tagus River. Situated in a renovated 18th century historic building, the hotel is decorated with art objects, books and photos.

Featuring free WiFi, all of the sunny rooms at As Janelas Verdes come with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a DVD player. Each modern bathroom is stocked with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer.

The courtyard with its plants offers a charming setting for breakfast during summer and spring, which is served from 08:00 to 11:00. Guests at As Janelas Verdes Hotel can also enjoy a tasty meal in the dining room, with its arched walls and antique decorations.

The library has a fireplace and opens out onto the balcony terrace, furnished with chairs and sofas. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s living room, adjoining the 24-hour front desk.

This romantic property is located on the banks of the river Tagus, in the triangle of the old quarters of Lapa, Madragoa and Santos, a 7-minute walk from Santos Train Station. São Bento Palace is a 15-minute walk away. Lisbon International Airport is within a 10-minute drive.

Modern, 4-star 9Hotel Mercy features spacious rooms overlooking old Lisbon and São Jorge castle. The larger rooms offer panoramic views over Bairro Alto, Tagus Bridge or São Jorge Castle.

The air-conditioned rooms were designed by Portuguese architect Miguel Saraiva. Every room has free WiFi and a minibar. The décor is modern, with contrasting colours.

A daily breakfast is served at the Lounge Bar. 9Hotel Mercy's terrace bar "In Heaven" is located on the 6th floor and offers panoramic views over São Jorge Castle and the Tagus River. Room service is available via the 24-hour front desk. There are also several bars and restaurants within 200 metres.

Lisbon’s Trindade Theatre is 50 metres from the 9Hotel Mercy. Rossio Train Station and Baixa/Chiado Metro Station are within 8 minutes’ walk. Lisbon International Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Pousada de Lisboa - Small Luxury Hotels Of The World
Description:
Located in a privileged location, at the very centre of Lisbon, Pousada de Lisboa - Small Luxury Hotels Of The World offers elegant accommodation with free WiFi and an à la carte restaurant.

Rooms feature a classical style and offer views for the Terreiro de Paço Square and Áurea Street. Each room comes with its own elegant private bathroom and fully equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, telephone, safety deposit box, soundproofing and minibar.

Pousada de Lisboa - Small Luxury Hotels Of The World features its own on-site restaurant and bar. Guests can taste a varied menu based in traditional Portuguese cuisine and in the evening relax at the bar while enjoying a drink.

Other facilities available on site include a wellness centre, a sauna and a fitness centre. Services available include car and bicycle rental.

Name: Quinta Colina by Shiadu
Description:
Situated in a quiet street in the heart of Lisbon’s peaceful Pena district, this property offers free WiFi access throughout and has a terrace with views across the city’s rooftops. The 18th century façade of golden lions is instantly recognizable and the property was fully renovated in April 2018.

All guest bedrooms at Quinta Colina by Shiadu are equipped with heated rooms, featuring private bathrooms, air-conditioning, a minibar and a telephone.

A continental breakfast buffet is available at the property each morning. There are many bars and restaurants in the streets surrounding the property.

The street in which the guest house is situated is famous as the birthplace of singer Amalia Rodrigues. A free walking tour of the area is available from the property staff.

The guest house is located a 5-minute walk from Praça do Rossio and is in walking distance from the nearest bus, metro and train stations. Public parking is available at 100 metres from the Quinta Colina by Shiadu.

Name: Altis Belem Hotel & Spa, a Member of Design Hotels
Description:
This luxury 5-star hotel occupies a unique waterfront location in the historic Lisbon district of Belém, next to the Tagus River. It features a Michelin Star restaurant, indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and a rooftop sun deck.

Rooms at Altis Belém Hotel & Spa feature LCD-TVs, electric curtains, Nespresso machines and modern bathrooms. All rooms have free WiFi access and panoramic views of the waterfront.

Guests can dine in the award-winning Altis Belém’s Feitoria Restaurant, which specialises in authour's cuisine, with varied world flavours. There is also the Cafetaria Mensagem, for lighter meals and snacks.

Altis Hotel’s spa has a wide dynamic inner pool, sauna, turkish bath and a range of treatments including massages. You can borrow a book from the library or explore beautiful Parque Florestal de Monsanto 4 km away.

At a 7-minute walk is the iconic Jerónimos Monastery, as well as the Belém Garden. MAAT Museum is located within 1.5 km. The hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from the Belém Cultural Centre. 6 km away from the hotel are historic Lisbon districts like Chiado, Rossio and Bairro Alto. It is 20 minutes’ drive from Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Lisbon Destination

Offering private and shared accommodations, Lisbon Destination is located in Lisbon’s central Rossio, inside the iconic Rossio Train Station. It an urban jungle lounge and a bar.

Lisbon Destination’s accommodations are bright and have free WiFi access. Some offer views of Rossio and others overlook the winter garden.

The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, toaster, kettle and basic kitchen supplies. Guests can enjoy a meal prepared by the chef while sharing experiences over dinner with other guests. There are plenty of bars and restaurants nearby as well.

Guests can use the free pool table and take part in one of the activities organised by the staff, available 24 hours a day. The winter garden provides a nice setting to enjoy a book and a chess game.

Guests wishing to explore further can take the train to Sintra and get there in a 20-minute ride. Belém, with its famous Pastéis de Belém is a 15-minute tram ride. Lisbon International Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Guest House Guerra Junqueiro II
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon, Guest House Guerra Junqueiro II is 300 meters from Alameda Metro Station and offers free WiFi in all areas. The historic centre is accessible via metro within 15 minutes.

The Guest House features rooms with 1, 2 or 3 single beds. Each has access to either private or shared bathroom facilities.

There is a shared kitchen where guests can prepare their own meals. There is a supermarket within less than 100 metres from the Guest House. Alternatively, guests can visit the restaurants that are within a short 5-minute walk.

The lively Bairro Alto is 3.7 km away and has a direct metro line to Alameda Station. The shopping areas of Rua Augusta and Baixa-Chiado are an 8 -minute drive or a 15-minute metro ride. Lisbon International Airport is just 6 km away and is also accessible via metro.

Name: AlmaLusa Baixa/Chiado
Description:
AlmaLusa Baixa/Chiado is located in a renovated 18th century building, at emblematic Município Square. It is surrounded by historic Lisbon sites and spots, like Commerce Square and Rossio, while also standing at a short walk from Chiado and the Tagus waterfront.

Guests of the AlmaLusa can expect an experience rich with comfort and history. The hotel features partnerships with various premium Portuguese brands, ensuring that its amenities and equipment are of the highest standard. Each of the air conditioned rooms, studios and suites features high-speed WiFi, a large HD Smart TV and a private bathroom with a power shower and free toiletries. All units have been individually decorated by a noted interior designer, featuring a historical inspiration on the Portuguese aristocracy.

The AlmaLusa Baixa/Chiado’s Delfina restaurant features an à la carte service, boasting a wide range of Portuguese, Mediterranean and international specialities, along with a vast wine selection. A snack-bar is also available, for guests craving a lighter meal or snack. Breakfast is available each morning and is served in the restaurant area. Those wishing to eat out, will be able to find many traditional eateries within a 5-minute walk.

The hotel bar is an ideal spot for guests to unwind at the end of the day and enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail. On the ground floor is the oldest part of the building, which includes a shop selling Castelbel products, as well as hotel souvenirs. The friendly front desk staff is available to assist guests 24 hours per day, including booking exclusive city tours. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are provided, upon an extra charge.

Rossio Square is an 8-minute walk from the hotel, while Chiado and its famed shops and cafés is within a 4-minute walk. Bairro Alto, Lisbon’s premier nightlife area, is a 10-minute walk away and also has an assortment of shops and restaurants. The Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is just 350 metres away and connects with most of the city’s more renowned areas. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km from AlmaLusa Baixa/Chiado, and is also accessible via metro.

Name: Sapateiros 44
Description:
Welcome to Sapateiros 44
Located in the heart of Lisbon’s vibrant downtown, Sapateiros 44 offers you the perfect base to explore the city’s charm and history. Our property is ideally positioned at 300 meters from Comércio Square and 200 meters from Rossio Square. Iconic landmarks such as Chiado, São Jorge Castle, and Alfama are all within a 5-minute walk, making it easy to immerse yourself in the rich culture and atmosphere of Lisbon.

Your Stay
At Sapateiros 44, we provide cozy accommodations with free WiFi throughout the property. Each room is thoughtfully equipped with a TV and a private bathroom, free toiletries, and a hair dryer. Accessible via a staircase and lift from the 1st floor, our rooms are designed to ensure comfort during your stay.
Breakfast with a Local Touch
Start your day with a delicious free breakfast in your stay. Served at a charming Portuguese coffee shop just a minute’s walk from the property, the menu includes a fresh sandwich or croissant, natural juice, and coffee. You will find a voucher in your room for each guest to show it in the bakery. It’s the perfect way to fuel up before exploring the city!

Convenient Location
Sapateiros 44 is easily accessible, with Portela Airport located just 7 kilometres away. Whether you’re here to discover Lisbon’s history, enjoy its vibrant nightlife, or simply relax, our central location ensures you’re never far from the action.
We look forward to welcoming you to Sapateiros 44, where comfort meets convenience in the heart of Lisbon!

Name: Altis Avenida Hotel
Description:
The 5-star Altis Avenida Hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Lisbon city. It is within a 5-minute walk from the shopping triangle, Rua Augusta Street, Chiado and Liberdade Avenue.

Altis Avenida Hotel is housed in a historical building, where guests will find a mix of traditional Portuguese architecture and design inspired by Art Deco. The plush rooms feature signature retro-style furniture with the soft shades of the leather headboards. Some rooms offer views of Lisbon's historical downtown and balconies.

With a singular view over Lisbon and Tagus River, the Rossio Gastrobar offers a surprising menu of shareable dishes, a signature menu of cocktails and a careful selection of wines. A tasty breakfast buffet may be enjoyed on the 7th floor with a panoramic view over Liberdade Avenue.

With a 24-hour front desk, the hotel features a business centre and meeting rooms. Laundry, dry cleaning, ironing and shoeshine services are provided, upon an extra fee. A car rental service is also available.

Name: Palácio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & Spa
Description:
Welcome to this palace that is your home. Here, where history stays for tomorrow, we do everything we can to honor your preference, and turn your dreams into an unforgettable journey.

STORYTELLING
Sitting at his dispatch table, in dim light so as not to completely wake up reality and time, is the Governor over the centuries that have passed and the centuries to come. Always with the Torre de Belém in sight, opening the way for MAAT's new currents.

With the pose of who is promptly waiting for someone, his imponent figure is clad in a cobalt blue jacket from which the cuffs and collars, literally immaculate, metaphorically free, escape.

Over the collars hangs a smiling face. With the humility of someone who forgets the ornaments that weigh on his chest - which make him live slightly leaning forward; with the curiosity for the future and the unknown of every second and centimeter of the world to be explored - and makes him live leaning significantly forward.

It's this smile that announces what he's going to say as soon as he approaches a guest: - What an honor to have you in my home, which is also yours. And you've come at just the right time. This space of ours, where history stays for the future, is perfect for sharing an adventure. It happened to me just yesterday. Or will it happen tomorrow? But first, let's have a gin with pink Indian pepper in the garden's tranquility, as I know you like, while they prepare our sushi, which is even fresher than in the Land of the Rising Sun.

Built in the former home of the Governor of the Belém Tower, exquisitely restored over Roman remains, probably dating from the 1st to 5th centuries, Palácio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & SPA is a place of all times. But this place is more than just a hotel, it is a legacy of our history that is preparing for a new stage in the future, inviting you to experience a unique present. Honoring you.

FACTS
Palácio do Governador – Lisbon Hotel & SPA has 60 rooms, all different, next to the river, in the historic centre of Belém, in one of the most beautiful and emblematic areas of the capital. Surrounded by national historical monuments, it's the natural choice for those who want to be in Lisbon, close to everything, from culture to leisure and far enough away to feel tranquillity. The Belém Tower is just a few steps away.

The hotel has two outdoor pools - one for adults and one for children, an area with bali beds and a poolside bar that supports the main bar.

Po Tat Restaurant - From the combination of the vibrant flavors of Pan-Asian cuisine and the adventurous spirit of 15th century Portuguese travelers came Po Tat (the name given to the Chinese tart inspired by the pastel de nata). The restaurant draws inspiration from centuries of Portuguese exploration to bring new techniques and reinvent flavors crossing Japan, China and Korea. At Po Tat tradition and innovation meet in a wave of flavours and each dish, prepared by Chef André Santos, is a culinary journey that transcends borders. You can't miss the chance to stamp this gastronomic experience in your travel passport.

Belém BarTolomeu Bar – A bar with the soul of an explorer, inspired on the explorer Bartolomeu Dias, and offering light meals in a symbiosis of three great cuisines, Asian, Portuguese and Mediterranean, with signature cocktails, where we toast to the spirit of exploration and the rich tapestry of cultures that make our world so wonderfully diverse. The menu also dazzles with the freshest flavors from the land and sea, which are a real provocation to the senses. All these flavors will transport you to another universe. The outdoor terrace is also the perfect place to enjoy a sunset with a cocktail in hand to the sound of the latest beats.

For those seeking rejuvenation, Felicitás Spa Governador is a 1200 sqm sanctuary with treatments aimed at promoting relaxation and revitalization. Guests and visitors can indulge in massages, facials, and therapies that combine premium products and skilled techniques, ensuring a tranquil escape from everyday stresses. Unwind with amenities such as: indoor pool with two waterfalls, caribbean shower storm, ice fountain, turkish bath, sauna, relaxation area and gym.

Palácio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & SPA is member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World™ (SLH), the world's most desirable community of independent travelers and independent hotels. SLH properties are able to offer secluded and discreet options with the highest standards of luxury and guest well-being.

Rossio is a 5-minute walk, while the lively bars of Bairro Alto are at a short walking distance.

The property features double and twin rooms. Some units include a kitchenette. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. Each room includes a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

Various traditional Portuguese restaurants are at a short 2-minute walk. Nearby Bairro Alto is renowned for its lively bars and abundance of popular eateries.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Anjo Azul features free WiFi only on the reception area. Laundry and luggage storage services are available.

The renowned Bica Lift is 200 metres from Anjo Azul. The cruise boat harbour and the Tagus riverside area is at a 9-minute walk. Rossio is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Anjo Azul.

Name: Deco Gem Bica

Featuring an Art Deco feel, the Deco Gem Bica is located in Lisbon’s historic Bica neighbourhood. The unit is is 350 metres from Santa Catarina Viewpoint and a 7-minute walk from lively Bairro Alto.

With a unique décor, created by a renowned interior decorator, the unit features a spacious living room with a cable TV and a mirrored wall. The wallpaper of the apartment has unusual patterns, adding to its charm. The unit features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

Guests may prepare their own meals in the kitchen, which includes all necessary cooking utensils. Alternatively, nearby Bairro Alto features a wide range of restaurants, cafés and bars.

Cais do Sodré, is a 10-minute walk away and also features the lively Ribeira Market, which has gourmet cuisine options. At a 20-minute walk are Rossio and Chiado, 2 of the city’s main historical areas. The apartment is 1.9 km from São Jorge Castle and from Alfama, the city’s Fado district. Name: Olissippo Lapa Palace – The Leading Hotels of the World
Description:
Built in the 19th-century, this luxurious 5-star hotel is nestled on a sub-tropical garden on a hilltop overlooking the Tagus River. It has an expansive spa and indoor and outdoor pools.

For relaxation, The Lapa Palace Spa features a sauna and a Turkish bath. The masseuses are also available to provide massages tailored to the individual client. There is also a modern gym equipped with cardiovascular equipment.

The elegant rooms at the Olissippo Lapa Palace are bright and airy and include a spacious seating area, satellite TV and a marble bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony with views of the Tagus River or the pool and sub-tropical garden.

Restaurant Hotel Lapa serves fine Mediterranean cuisine and regional wines, while Le Pavillion, during summer time, serves cocktails, homemade iced teas and fruit juices around the pool. On warmer days, meals can be enjoyed on the terrace. In the evenings, the live music is featured.

Central Lisbon is a short drive from the Olissippo. Free private parking is available onsite.
