Name: Verride Palácio Santa Catarina
Description:
This luxurious property has a privileged location, in Lisbon's historic centre and overlooking the Tagus River. Verride Palácio Santa Catarina consists of stylish rooms and suites, blending vintage details with modern comforts. The building's rooftop area features sweeping 360º views over the city.

Each room or suite has a distinctive and clean décor and features, with some having balcony views over the Tagus River, while others overlook the traditional Bica neighborhood. With radiant heated floors throughout, the units all have large windows, plenty of natural light and custom furnishings, with a predominance on Portuguese materials. Aesop amenities are available in the modern and elegant bathrooms of each unit.

Guests may enjoy a customized breakfast in a large table or in the outdoor esplanade overlooking the pool and city or enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant.  With river and Cristo Rei views, the Suba restaurant provides a prime dining experience, with modern twists on classic Portuguese cuisine. There is also a rooftop bar.

The property's common areas have an exquisite and exclusive feel to them, with some featuring details like imported chandeliers from European palaces, silk-lined walls and varied art pieces on display. Verride has a small swimming pool area, in a terrace which overlooks Lisbon's rooftops and the river.

The property is right next to Santa Catarina Belvedere and is just 300 metres from Chiado. Bairro Alto, one of Lisbon's most hip nightlife spots is within a 3-minute walk. At a 15-minute walk is Commerce Square and the well-known Augusta Street Arch, both next to the riverside. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 9.4 km from the Verride Palácio Santa Catarina. Airport shuttle services are available, upon previous request.

Name: Casinha das Flores
Description:
Casinha das Flores is located in the Chiado at the very heart of historical Lisbon, 200 metres from Bairro Alto. The picturesque guest house features comfortable rooms with free WiFi and air conditioning.

Accessibly via a staircase, each room comes with a private bathroom, satellite TV and a wardrobe. Some rooms include a balcony with views of the city and the Tagus River. Common areas include an elegant lounge with sofas, a centennial library and a typical 18th century kitchen decorated with Portuguese tiles.

In the vicinity, guests will find a plethora of restaurants and at Bairro Alto a variety of attractive bars and cultural programmes.

The famous Tram 28 stops just 20 metres away from the property and offers guests a tour for the most charismatic streets of Lisbon. The Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away while Cais do Sodré, with connections to Belém, Estoril and Cascais, is 450 metres away. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Lost Inn Lisbon Hostel
Description:
The Lost Inn Lisbon Hostel is located in the historical Chiado area in Lisbon. Set in a renovated 18th century building, it features free WiFi and is a 5-minute walk from the Cais do Sodré Metro and Train Station.

The wooden-floor rooms of the hostel feature access to shared bathroom facilities. They include beds in mixed and gender-specific dorm rooms as well as private twin and double rooms. All rooms feature views over the city.

This hostel features a well-equipped common kitchen, where guests can prepare their own meals. These can be enjoyed in the comfortable dining areas. There are also several restaurant options available within a 3-minute walk from the property.

The Lost Inn Lisbon has a communal living room with sofas, computers, cable TV, DVD player and a movie library. Guests can rent cars and bicycles through the 24-hour front desk, which also doubles as a tour desk, providing city tours upon request.

The Bairro Alto nightlife hotspot, with its many bars and nighttime establishments is a 10-minute walk from the hostel. The hostel is a 7-minute drive from the Lisbon city centre in Marquês do Pombal Square. Belém, with its Monastery and its famed Pastéis de Belém are a 13-minute drive away. The famed and scenic Glória Lift, which provides sweeping views over the city is an 8-minute walk. Likewise, the Santa Justa Lift is a 9-minute walk.

The Lisbon International Airport is 8 km away, while Sintra and Cascais are a 30-minute train ride away. It is a 15-minute walk from the Rossio Train Station.

Name: House Petit Lusa
Description:
Located in the historical neighbourhood of Alfama in Lisbon, Hostel Petit Lusa offers accommodation in private rooms with bathroom and also a spacious family room. The property is a 6-minute walk from the Santa Apolónia train and metro station. Commerce Square and the famed Augusta Strret Arch are both at 400 metres.

This hostel’s private double rooms are individually decorated with different Portuguese themes and each offers a TV, as well as access to a private bathroom with a shower. The family room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries, a large double bed and 4 bunk beds. The hostel's décor features various paintings and art pieces. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

A daily Continental breakfast is included in every rate and, in addition, there is a shared kitchen accessible from 12:00 to 20:00 where guests can prepare light meals. Various local restaurants are available within a short walk. The lobby has living and breakfast areas and is equipped with a cable TV.

Hostel Petit Lusa is conveniently located within 13-minute walk from the iconic São Jorge Castle and Lisbon’s Pombaline Downtown. The Fado Museum is just around the corner and the lively Bairro Alto 1.5 km away. The Santa Justa Lift is within 900 metres. Lisbon International Airport is easily accessible via metro and is 6.5 km.

Name: HI Parque das Nações – Pousada de Juventude
Description:
Located in Lisbon, the HI Parque das Nações – Pousada de Juventude is set in one of the trendiest districts of the city and is just a few metres from the Moscavide train station and within 2 km from the Lisbon Oceanarium and the Altice Arena.

Featuring free WiFi throughout, this youth hostel offers double rooms, twins rooms and beds in male and female dormitories. Some rooms offer access to private bathrooms, the linens are provided for free. Each accommodation is equipped with heating, a wardrobe and a desk.

Guests have at their disposal a self-service restaurant, a shared kitchen to prepare their own light meals and a shared lounge with a TV to socialize or relax. In addition, guests will find a multitude of restaurants in the vicinity. The Vasco da Gama shopping centre is a 15-minute walk and features a great variety of eateries and brand shops.

Within a 1 km radius guests have access to a pharmacy, a health club, various schools, bars, cafés and even the scenic Passeio dos Heróis do Mar Garden and the iconic Vasco da Gama Tower with panoramic views over the Tejo River and the city of Lisbon. Lisbon International Airport is 3 km away.

Name: Lisbon Five Stars Apartments Bica
Description:
Set in Lisbon’s historic area, Lisbon Five Stars Apartments Bica features elegant and tastefully renovated apartments. Chiado is within a 10-minute walk, as is the riverfront Cais do Sodré, with its lively bars and eateries.

The apartments all have ample areas, with plenty of natural light and a colourful décor. Each comes with a living area which includes a flat-screen TV, sofas and a dining area. There is also a full modern kitchen, as well as a private bathroom which has a hair dryer. Free WiFi is featured.

Guests are welcome to try their hand at preparing some traditional Portuguese cuisine in the kitchen, which all the necessary appliances. Alternatively, various restaurants and cafés are available nearby, many within a 5-minute walk. The trendy Ribeira Market is a 5-minute walk and is filled with assorted eateries and booths.

Stunning views over the city are possible from the Santa Catarina Belvedere, at just 350 metres. Bairro Alto, the city’s most renowned nightlife area, is a 10-minute walk away and also has many restaurants and shops. Rossio is 1.5 km away, while Commerce Square is at 1.4 km. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 11 km from Lisbon Five Stars Apartments Bica.

Name: Hotel Ibis Lisboa Parque das Nações
Description:
Hotel Ibis Lisboa Parque das Nações is a quiet Lisbon hotel, a 15-minute drive from the city centre. Sited in the Parque das Nações, it is a 10-minute walk from attractions such as the Atlântico Pavillion or the Lisbon Casino.

The non-smoking rooms at the hotel feature either double or twin beds, work desk, free WiFi, wooden floors, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

In order to improve our product and offer more comfort to our customers, we would like to inform you that IBIS PARQUE DAS NAÇÕES will be undergoing renovation work throughout its lobby between January 6th and March 31st, 2025. Working hours are Monday to Saturday, from 10h00 to 18h00. We apologize for the inconvenience. Breakfast in a take-away box. Thank you compression.

The property features a bar, where guests can enjoy a refreshing drink and enjoy the comfortable lounge area. The property's fitness centre has a tranquil ambiance, situated on the ground floor and with garden views.It has plenty of natural light, via its floor-to-ceiling windows and also includes state-of-the-art fitness equipment. There is a sauna that can accommodate up to 6 people.

The Lisbon centre is a short drive and has shops, cafés and restaurants. 18-minute drive from the Bairro Alto, Lisbon’s main bar and nightlife area. It is a 10-minute walk from the Lisbon Casino and an 18-minute walk from the famous Oceanarium. The FIL (International Lisbon Fair) is a 9-minute walk away and regularly holds thematic business fairs. The Lisbon International Airport is a 10-minute drive from the Hotel Ibis Lisboa Parque das Nações.

Name: Palácio Camões - Lisbon Serviced Apartments
Description:
Palácio Camões is classified as a National Monument and offers modern, self-catering apartments overlooking Tejo River. They are located in Bairro Alto, 600 metres from Baixa/Chiado Metro Station.

All elevator-accessible apartments include a fully equipped kitchen, and some are duplexes. The serviced apartments offer a bright décor with parquet floors. Some include a furnished terrace, and free Wi-Fi access is included.

Guests wishing a hassle-free stay can take advantage of their central location and enjoy the variety of restaurants and bars nearby, as well as trendy shops in Bairro Alto.

Palácio Camões - Lisbon Serviced Apartments is a 4-minute walk from Santa Catarina viewpoint, offering panoramic Tejo River views, and São Jorge Castle is 25 minutes’ walking, offering some of the best panoramic views of Lisbon.

Lisbon International Airport is 11 km from the apartments and easily accessible by public transports. Rossio Train Station is 2 km away and offers links to Sintra in a 30-minute train ride.

Name: Tagus Apartments by Lisbon Village Apartments
Description:
Tagus Apartments by Lisbon Village Apartments are comfortable and bright units located in the cobbled streets of Alfama, one of Lisbon’s oldest districts. The self-catering apartments and studios are modernly decorated and feature views over the Portuguese capital.

All of the apartments and studios feature free WiFi access and include a comfortable living room with flat-screen satellite TV, private bathroom and an equipped kitchenette.

Several traditional Fado music houses are available within 300 metres, which also serve Portuguese cuisine. Alternatively, guests can prepare meals in their fully-equipped kitchenettes.

São Jorge Castle offers panoramic views over Lisbon and is a 7-minute walk away. The Tagus River is a 5-minute walk from the property. Augusta Street is one of Lisbon’s main shopping streets and is a 15-minute walk. The historical Rossio area is 2 km away and has a multitude of shops and local cafés. The Lisbon city centre is a 9-minute drive and has a number of shops, boutiques and restaurants.

The Santa Apolónia Train and Metro Stations are a 9-minute walk from the Tagus Apartments by Lisbon Village Apartments. The Lisbon International Airport can be reached in a 16-minute drive.

The air-conditioned apartments and studios all include a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking station and a balcony. The modern kitchenettes come with Nespresso coffe machines and a dining area. Each unit also includes a private bathroom. An automatic check-in and check-out service is provided.

Name: Upon Lisbon Prime Residences
Description:
Upon Lisbon Residences features elegant apartments and studios, with views over SL Benfica's Stadium of Light. Featuring an on site restaurant and bar on the rooftop area, guests can enjoy a meal with a view to the stadium. Alto dos Moinhos Metro Station is 600 metres away and connects with the city centre.

The studios and apartments all feature a modern décor, with plenty of natural light. Each is air conditioned and includes a flat-screen cable TV, as well as a sofa in the comfortable living area. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries and there is also a full kitchenette, including a coffee machine.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchenette, which comes fully equipped. Alternatively, guests can visit the on site restaurant or enjoy drink at the bar area. The nearby Colombo Shopping Centre has an extensive food court, along with various shops, boutiques and even cinemas.

The building's rooftop area also boasts an outdoor swimming pool, which all guests of the Upon Lisbon are welcome to use. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Rossio, in Lisbon's historical downtown area is a 20-minute metro ride away, while Liberty Avenue's high end shops are a 17-minute metro ride from Upon Lisbon Residences. The lively bar areas of Bairro Alto and Cais do Sodré are at 10 km and 11.3 km, respectively. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.2 km from Upon Lisbon Residences and is reachable via metro.

Name: WOT New Lisbon
Description:
WOT New Lisbon is located in Lisbon, 200 metres from Príncipe Real Garden. The unit is in a renovated 18th century building, with original portuguese tiles and vintage décor pieces. With a large ball pit, the hostel is just a 5-minute walk from lively Bairro Alto’s bars and restaurants.

The hostel features accommodation in private double rooms and dormitories. The dormitories are divided into mixed and gender-specific rooms. Most of the accommodation comes with access to shared bathroom facilities. Some of the rooms feature panoramic river views.

Breakfast is available daily, from 7:30 to 10:30. Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the fully equipped communal kitchen at their disposal. There is also a shared dining area, as well as an on-site bar. A variety of local restaurants is accessible through a 5-minute walk, most serving traditional Portuguese meals.

After a day of sightseeing, the interior patio with sofas and showers is the perfect scenario for a relaxing break. The games room includes a foosball table.

Historic Chiado is 900 metres from WOT New Lisbon, while the high-end stores and boutiques of the famed Avenida da Liberdade are at a 10-minute walk. São Jorge Castle is within 2.2 km and Rossio is at 1.2 km. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 8 km away from the WOT New Lisbon.
